column1: EVTOPTA150000;Surely it can't be that bad!;;;;;;x
EVTNAME150001;The Suez Crisis;;;;;;x
EVTDESC150001;Egypt has nationalised the Suez Canal
column2: if we do not act we risk losing this vital imperial asset along with much prestige.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA150001;Let them have it;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB150001;We shall take it back by force!;;;;;;x
EVTNAME150002;Decolonisation Completed;;;;;;x
EVTDESC150002;The era of colonial exploitation is coming to an end in $COUNTRY$. Our colonial days shall never be forgotten even so
column2: for good and for worse.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA150002;Well we had a good run at it anyway;;;;;;x
EVTNAME150010;Islamic Fundamentalism;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTDESC150010;Angered by what they see as Western decadence
column2: imperialism and oppression of muslims worldwide
column3: many of our citizens are joining organisations determined to fight Western influence and replace it with the strictest islamic code of conduct. They also believe in the restoration of the old islamic caliphate and its eventual expansion.;x;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTOPTA150010;Just a passing fad;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTNAME160001;The Taiping Rebellion;;Die Taiping-Rebellion;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC160001;A great rebellion has sundered all under Heaven!;;Eine große Rebellion hat alle unter den Weiten des Himmels aufgespalten.;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTOPTA160001;Crush them!;;Vernichtet sie!;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTOPTB160001;Out with the Manchu!;;Weg mit den Manchu!;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTNAME160502;Anti-Manchu feeling;;Anti-Manchu Bewegung;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC160502;Emperor
column2: our officials have detected growing levels of discontent and even hostility towards our Dynasty. This feeling is enflamed by the humiliating presence of the foreign devils in our cities and harbors. How shall we respond?;;Herrscher
column3: die Offiziellen berichten von einer wachsenden Welle des Unfriedens und sogar der Feindschaft gegen unsere Dynastie. Dieses Gefühl wird noch verstärkt durch die Anwesenheit der fremden Teufel in unseren Städten und Häfen. Wie sollen wir darauf reagieren?;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: EVTOPTA160502;A show of force should deal with this.;;Eine Demonstration unserer Macht sollte helfen.;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTOPTB160502;Do not waste my time with this nonsense!;;Verschwendet meine Zeit nicht mit diesem Unfug!;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTNAME170000;The Space Race is On;;;;;;x

EVTDESC170000;Technological advances have opened up a new frontier - Space. Scientists from all major nations are now putting into practice plans to send national assets into orbit in order for their country to be the first to reap the benefits from these technologies. The most ambitious plan being a manned mission to the moon and back
column2: which would strenghten our place in the world as well as providing valuable scientific data for our researchers.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA170000;We choose to go to the Moon!;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB170000;Hold off for now;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC170000;A pointless enterprise;;;;;;x
EVTNAME170001;Spacecraft Explodes on Launch;;;;;;x
EVTDESC170001;The spacecraft designed to send $COUNTRY_ADJ$ astronauts to the moon has exploded on launch. An investigation into the disaster shows faulty equipment was to blame.;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA170001;Try again;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB170001;Let's concentrate on Earthly matters;;;;;;x
EVTNAME170002;Moon-Landing Mission Lost Halfway There;;;;;;x
EVTDESC170002;An explosion in our spacecraft bound to the Moon led to its disintegration
column2: the crew was left to die a lonely death in the void of space.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA170002;Try again;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB170002;Enough of this
column2: let's concentrate on Earthly matters;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME170003;$COUNTRY_ADJ$ Man First On The Moon!;;;;;;x
EVTDESC170003;The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ space agency has successfully landed the first man on the moon
column2: a man from $COUNTRY$!;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA170003;That's one small step for a man
column2: one giant leap for mankind;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME170004;First Moon Colony Founded;;;;;;x
EVTDESC170004;$FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ organisations have announced today that they have successfully permanently settled the first men on the Moon. The Moon
column2: with its significantly lower gravity
column3: lack of atmosphere and unique geological features
column4: could prove invaluable to our scientists
column5: and its dusty soil is said to hide many rare resources. Although time only will tell whether the enterprise was worth it
column6: the so-called 'space colonists' involved are said to be excited and determined to make it so
column7: this is undoubtedly an historic moment!;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA170004;$COUNTRY$ rules the Moon!;;;;;;x
EVTNAME170005;First Moon Colony Founded By $FROMCOUNTRY$;;;;;;x

EVTDESC170005;$FROMCOUNTRY$ has announced today that $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ organisations have permanently settled the first men on the Moon in what is described as an "Economic and Scientific Mission". The Moon
column2: with its significantly lower gravity than Earth
column3: lack of atmosphere and unique geological features
column4: could prove invaluable to $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ scientists
column5: and its dusty soil is said to hide many rare resources. Although time only will tell whether the enterprise was worth it
column6: the so-called 'space colonists' involved are said to be excited and determined to make it so
column7: this is undoubtedly an historic moment!;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA170005;Astounding!;;;;;;x
EVTNAME170006;First Mars Colony Founded;;;;;;x
EVTDESC170006;$FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ organisations have announced today that they have successfully landed what is to be the first permanent settlement on Mars. Mars
column2: with its low gravity
column3: thin atmosphere
column4: unique geological features and the possibility of ancient life
column5: could prove invaluable to our scientists. And its red earth is thought to hide many rare resources. Although time only will tell whether the enterprise was worth it
column6: the so-called 'space colonists' involved are said to be excited and determined to make it so
column7: this is undoubtedly an historic moment!;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA170006;Mars is $COUNTRY_ADJ$!;;;;;;x
EVTNAME170007;First Mars Colony Founded By $FROMCOUNTRY$;;;;;;x

EVTDESC170007;$FROMCOUNTRY$ has announced today that $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ organisations have successfully landed what is to be the first permanent settlement on Mars in what is described as an "Economic and Scientific Mission". Mars
column2: with its low gravity
column3: thinner atmosphere unique geological features and the possibility of ancient life
column4: could prove invaluable to $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ scientists
column5: and its red earth is thought to hide many rare resources. Although time only will tell whether the enterprise was worth it
column6: the so-called 'space colonists' involved are said to be excited and determined to make it so
column7: this is undoubtedly an historic moment!;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA170007;Impressive;;;;;;x
EVTNAME170010;Incident in $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Colony on the Moon;;;;;;x

EVTDESC170010;Vague reports of a major incident have reached us from our colony on the moon. Many colonists are reported to have died and many more are wounded. Most of our scientists on Earth suspect an asteroid strike or equipment failure to be the cause.;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA170010;Send emergency teams to assess the damage and assist the colony;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB170010;They are on their own;;;;;;x
EVTNAME170011;Incident in $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Martian Colony;;;;;;x

EVTDESC170011;Vague reports of a major incident have reached us from our colony on Mars. Many colonists are reported to have died and many more are wounded. Most of our scientists on Earth suspect a major storm
column2: marsquake or equipment failure to be the cause.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA170011;Send emergency teams to assess the damage and assist the colony;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB170011;They are on their own;;;;;;x
EVTNAME170012;Dispute on the Moon;;;;;;x

EVTDESC170012;When a foreigner from another nearby lunar colony was caught wandering in the halls of the life support chamber tensions escalated quickly. Accusations thrown to and fro put the two tightly-knit communities against each other and resulted in the death of a young $COUNTRY_ADJ$ woman. She has now become a martyr and many
column2: including our colonists
column3: are openly calling for the foreign power to be expelled from the Moon.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA170012;This shall not go unpunished!;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB170012;Let us not overreact;;;;;;x
EVTNAME170013;Dispute on Mars;;;;;;x

EVTDESC170013;When a foreigner from another nearby Martian colony was caught wandering in the halls of the life support chamber tensions escalated quickly. Accusations thrown to and fro put the two tightly-knit communities against each other and resulted in the death of a young $COUNTRY_ADJ$ woman. She has now become a martyr and many
column2: including our colonists
column3: are openly calling for the foreign power to be expelled from Mars.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA170013;This shall not go unpunished!;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB170013;Let us not overreact;;;;;;x
EVTNAME170504;A Jewel Lost;;;;;;x
EVTDESC170504;India
column2: once said to be the jewel in the crown of our empire
column3: has now been lost. Is this the beginning of the end for the British Empire?";;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA170504;Well
column2: we had a good run!;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME200000;The Pakistan Movement;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;

EVTDESC200000;Following the rise of the recent Indian independence movement led by Mahatma Gandhi the Mohammedian people of India have started to campaign for a country of their own should India be declared a free nation. Naturally the nation would be carved out of our North-Western Indian posessions as it is the region with the largest concentration of Moslems. The movement has become widespread and gained in radicalism over the years
column2: should we not promise them their nation we can expect an increase in tensions between the Moslem Indians and their Hindu neighbours.;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTOPTA200000;Very well;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTNAME200001;Gandhi and Indian Independence;;;;;;x

EVTDESC200001;Mahatma Gandhi has gained much popularity amongst his fellow Indians through his practice of peaceful civil disobedience and is becoming more and more of a problem. His aim is to expel $COUNTRY_ADJ$ forces out of India and form an independent nation. What shall we do with him?;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA200001;Imprison him and deal with the dissenters;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB200001;Leave him be;;;;;;x
EVTNAME200002;Civil Disobedience;;;;;;x
EVTDESC200002;Our Indian subjects
column2: under the leadership of Gandhi
column3: have found novel ways to pester us. While they will not repeat the mistakes of their sepoy forebears and openly challenge our might
column4: they have started to deny our right to rule over them by standing completely still and not responding to commands from their $COUNTRY_ADJ$ superiors no matter how much pressure is applied. This will undoubtedly affect production.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA200002;Damn them!;;;;;;x
EVTNAME200010;Homosexuals want to Marry;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTDESC200010;The issue has divided the nation in recent months. What shall be the government's position?;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTOPTA200010;Express support for the idea;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTOPTB200010;Denounce the idea;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTOPTC200010;This is hardly important is it?;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTNAME200030;The Rise of Zionism;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTDESC200030;Zionism
column2: a Jewish Movement advocating a 'return' of Jews to their ancestral homeland
column3: has grown in popularity over the years and many Jewish organisations are now offering to send migrants there. It is said that the rise of zionism is partly due to increasing intolerance by nationalist elements in European nations
column4: who view Jews as profiteering internationalists due to their nomadic nature and close ties with the banking profession.;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTOPTA200030;Trouble's brewing;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTDESC200031;It has recently come to our attention that many unhappy Jews living in $COUNTRY$ are leaving for Palestine. They call the migration 'Aliyah'
column2: an hebrew word meaning 'ascent'. According to them God has promised the land to the Jewish people and they are merely returning to their home country.;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTOPTA200031;I doubt the locals will approve!;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTNAME200032;Trouble in the Holy Land;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTDESC200032;Recent Jewish immigrants from Europe have met stiff opposition from the local muslim community in recent times
column2: they resent the nationalist zionist cause and have responded with their own national claim on Palestine. It is feared that this conflict could escalate into a full-blown civil war.;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTOPTA200032;Stop Jewish immigrants from landing in Palestine;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTOPTB200032;These Moslems must learn to share;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTNAME200040;Final European Integration Protocol;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTDESC200040;Years of labour and diplomacy have finally resulted in the abolition of European nation states
column2: all members of the European Union will now become mere regions of the EU superstate;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTOPTA200040;We all saw that coming;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTNAME200041;Final European Integration Protocol;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTDESC200041;Let's give the keys to the EU
column2: there will be no more $COUNTRY$.;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTNAME200060;British Raj;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;

EVTDESC200074;The native Americans of Northern Quebec object to the inclusion of their ancestral homelands into our new nation and wish to remain part of Canada. They have cited various territorial treaties entered with British Kings in colonial times as evidence that their lands cannot be claimed by Quebec separatists.;;;;;;x
EVTDESC200075;Recent developments leave no doubts in anyone's mind
column2: $COUNTRY$ has truly become a world superpower. Our nation now shines like no other and as such we are expected to set an example for the world.;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTOPTA200075;$COUNTRY$ rules!;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTDESC200076;Despite our best efforts it seems like our time as a world superpower has come to an end.;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTNAME200500;Nintendo;;;;;;x
EVTDESC200500;An old
column2: moderately-successful Japanese company called Nintendo has recently become quite popular and successful all over the world following its breakthrough in the fleding video game industry.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA200500;Excellent;;;;;;x
EVTNAME200600;Elvis Presley;;;;;;x
EVTDESC200600;A young American from Tupelo
column2: Mississipi called Elvis Aaron Presley has been catapulted to fame thanks to his innovative style and music. Although this will certainly contribute to $COUNTRY_ADJ$ cultural hegemony and prestige the government should take note of the possible liberal influence 'the King' may have on the younger generation.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA200600;The King Rules!;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB200600;Arrest him;;;;;;x
EVTNAME200601;The Death of Elvis;;;;;;x
EVTDESC200601;Elvis Presley is dead!;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA200601;Or is he?;;;;;;x
EVTNAME200602;Clinton-Lewinsky Scandal;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTDESC200602;Mr. President
column2: rumours of inadequate relations with a White House intern
column3: Ms. Lewinsky
column4: and you have triggered a media storm.;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTNAME200604;The Watergate Scandal;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;

EVTDESC200604;It has been revealed that our administration is wire-tapping opponents in order to blackmail them. Following calls for his impeachment President Nixon had no choice but to resign.;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTOPTA200604;I am not a crook!;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTNAME200605;Martin-Zimmerman Case;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTDESC200605;Left-wing activists and the Afro-American community in this country are protesting after neighbourhood watch George Zimmerman
column2: who killed a 17-year old black man apparently in self-defense was acquitted in court today. They claim the acquital shows that racism is still alive in $COUNTRY$ and will not back down until Zimmerman is sent to prison. The case has the potential to cause riots all over the nation.;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTOPTA200605;$COUNTRY$ is a nation of laws;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTOPTB200605;Side with the mob;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTNAME200606;Walt Disney;;;;;;x
EVTDESC200606;The excellence and innovation of Mr. Walt Disney
column2: an $COUNTRY_ADJ$ animator
column3: has attracted worldwide attention. His animations have charmed young and old alike all over the planet and his company seems destined for much success.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA200606;Marvelous!;;;;;;x
EVTNAME200607;Coca-Cola;;;;;;x
EVTDESC200607;Colonel John Pemberton
column2: a wounded veteran of the civil war and morphine addict
column3: has recently registered a rather tasty soft drink which he calls Coca-Cola. The drink
column4: which is partly made from coca
column5: hence its name
column6: has grown immensily in popularity in $COUNTRY$. So much so in fact that three different companies now offer the product!;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA200607;Delicious and refreshing!;;;;;;x
EVTNAME200700;James Bond;;;;;;x
EVTDESC200700;Ian Fleming
column2: a $COUNTRY_ADJ$ author and naval intelligence officer
column3: has created a fictional character based on the lives of our country's secret service agents. James Bond's charismatic and thoroughly loyal and patriotic personality has charmed the nation and his adventures behind the lines of enemy nations and factions will continue to inspire people for decades to come.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA200700;I'll drink to that! Martini please
column2: shaken not stirred;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA200701;$COUNTRY$ needs more lads like him;;;;;;x
EVTNAME200702;The Beatles;;;;;;x

EVTDESC200702;A promising English music band called 'The Beatles' has just risen to fame. Although this will certainly contribute to $COUNTRY_ADJ$ cultural hegemony and prestige the government should take note of the group's favourable position regarding revolutionaries.;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA200702;Hey Jude!;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB200702;Arrest them;;;;;;x
EVTNAME200703;The Oka Crisis;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;

EVTDESC200703;A dispute over land usage around a mohawk reserve near Oka has degenerated into a full-blown Indian revolt. They have set up barricades on bridges and key roads leading into Oka and now threaten to rise up and wage war against $COUNTRY_ADJ$ people if we don't back down.;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTOPTA200703;They will regret this;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTOPTB200703;Let them keep their land;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTNAME200704;The Chief is Elected;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;

EVTDESC200704;John G. Diefenbaker was elected Prime Minister of Canada. His strongly nationalist ideals and uncompromising stance regarding Canada's Southern neighbour is sure to benefit the nation.;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTOPTA200704;I am not anti-American. But I am strongly pro-Canadian;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTNAME200706;John Lennon Killed;;;;;;x
EVTDESC200706;Lennon was murdered today in New York
column2: shot multiple times in the back by a deranged fan. Even as millions are mourning his death some have put forward a theory that our government is behind it all
column3: pointing to the singer and revolutionary's troubles with the immigration office as evidence that he was not wanted in $COUNTRY$.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA200706;Oh well;;;;;;x
EVTNAME200800;An Extraordinary Frenchman;;;;;;x
EVTDESC200800;A man named Charles DeGaulle has risen through the ranks and proven himself a valiant leader of men. His name is on every lips in France!;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA200800;$COUNTRY$ needs more men like him;;;;;;x
EVTNAME201000;Victoria 2;;;;;;x
EVTDESC201000;A sequel to the video game 'Victoria' has just been released by the gaming studio 'Paradox Interactive'. The goal of the game is to achieve global domination through diplomatic
column2: industrial and military means.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA201000;I prefer the real deal;;;;;;x
EVTNAME201001;Call of Duty;;;;;;x

EVTDESC201001;A video game series centered around the heroic actions of $COUNTRY_ADJ$ soldiers in a time of war with foreign factions has become incredibly popular worldwide. Although the long term cultural effects of the game remain uncertain
column2: experts already point to a rise in jingoistic fervour.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA201001;Excellent!;;;;;;x
EVTNAME201002;Grand Theft Auto;;;;;;x
EVTDESC201002;A game series made in $COUNTRY$ called Grand Theft Auto has become hugely popular. However
column2: its irreverent humour
column3: satirical representation of the modern world and open world criminal action has also stirred up quite a bit of controversy.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA202000;It's a Far Cry™ from Super Mario!;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB202000;How ridiculous! Ban it!;;;;;;x
EVTNAME202000;Japan Likes Our Sexy Official;;;;;;x

EVTDESC202000;Natalia Vladimirovna Poklonskaya has reached international fame after a recent press conference. A cult of personality has begun in Japan and they’re ravenous for Crimean political officials! Glory to Crimea!;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA202000;They can’t get enough of her!;;;;;;x
EVTDESC210000;In order to control the spread of deadly viruses and improve human health worldwide the United Nations have today created the World Health Organisation
column2: or WHO. It is hoped that in years to come the agency will be able to prevent pandemics by using the combined resources of the world and having unrestricted access to all corners of the planet.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME250000;The Warsaw Pact;;;;;;x
EVTDESC250000;The Soviet Union has invited us to sign the Warsaw Pact. Through this act
column2: we acknowledge the Soviet Union as the leader of the Communist struggle against Capitalism.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA250000;Hurrah for the USSR!;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB250000;Our country will maintain its sovereignty;;;;;;x
EVTNAME250001;The Warsaw Pact;;;;;;x
EVTDESC250001;The Soviet Union has invited us to sign the Warsaw Pact. Through this act
column2: we acknowledge the Soviet Union as the leader of the Communist struggle against Capitalism.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA250001;Hurrah for the USSR!;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB250001;Our country will maintain its sovereignty;;;;;;x
EVTNAME271000;Planter's Association;;;;;;x;;

EVTDESC271000;The population of the Seychelles is feeling neglected by $COUNTRY$. Agitation is rising from the newly formed Planters Association for greater representation in the governance of Seychelles affairs.;;;;;;x;;
EVTOPTA271000;We can still rule over them
column2: right?;;;;;;x;;

column1: EVTDESC400001;With the people behind us we are now firmly in control of this new American nation. While there is much talk about a Republic based on the values of the enlightenment
column2: and indeed Thomas Jefferson has written the draft of a declaration stating just that
column3: there is nothing preventing us from following a different path.;;;;;;x;;

column1: EVTDESC400002;$MONARCHTITLE$! Your majesty's governor of Massachussets reports that three East India Company tea ships
column2: the Dartmouth
column3: the Eleanor and the Beaver have been savagely attacked by rebellious colonists in Boston. The rebels
column4: calling themselves 'sons of liberty' and disguised as Indians under the leadership of Samuel Adams
column5: forcibly made their way aboard the ships and proceeded to throw overboard thousands of pounds worth of tea! All this apparently in protest of our recent Tea Act. What shall we do?;;;;;;x;;

column1: EVTDESC400005;Multiple disputes over the ownership of frontier territories between $COUNTRY_ADJ$ colonies and those of a foreign power have resulted in an increasingly tense climate. We would surely be justified should we choose to take action against these foreign colonists
column2: although some in our court suggest we should ease the tensions by finding a compromise so as to avoid an armed conflict.;;;;;;x;;

column1: EVTNAME401002;The Holy Roman Empire;;;;;;x;;

EVTDESC401002;The Holy Roman Empire is a largely decentralised organisation made up of many states dating back to the coronation of Charlemagne on Christmas day of the year 800. The emperor is chosen from amongst other rulers by his fellow prince electors. Our advisors are wisely reminding us that we are part of it.;;;;;;x;;
EVTNAME401003;The Bishops' War;;;;;;x;;
EVTDESC401003;The Scots have become wary of the increasing Anglican influence North of the border and are now in open rebellion. We risk losing control over Scotland if we do not act.;;;;;;x;;

EVTDESC401011;The natives in $PROVINCENAME$ are dying in great numbers due to a terrible disease. The fact that they insist they have never endured such a calamity before our arrival seems to suggest we may have brought it with us from Europe. We are powerless to stop it
column2: but attempts to alleviate their sufferings may help soothe the tensions between them and our colonists.;;;;;;x;;

column1: EVTDESC401013;Cowardly natives have attacked our colony in $PROVINCENAME$ and killed many of our subjects
column2: sparing neither women nor children. Some men from the neighbouring colonies and abled survivors have banded together and are ready to pursue the raiders into their territory should we choose to retaliate.;;;;;;x;;

column1: EVTDESC401014;Differences between Catholics and Protestants have erupted today in $PROVINCENAME$ resulting in a number of deaths and a tense stalemate between the two sides. Catholics
column2: who are the minority
column3: vow to continue fighting as long as their demands are not met.;;;;;;x;;

column1: EVTDESC401015;Differences between Catholics and Protestants have erupted today in $PROVINCENAME$ resulting in a number of deaths and a tense stalemate between the two sides. Protestants
column2: who are the minority
column3: vow to continue fighting as long as their demands are not met.;;;;;;x;;

column1: EVTNAME402010;Reichsdeputationshauptschluss;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC402010;The mediatization brought about a massive change to the political map of Germany. Literally hundreds of states were eliminated
column2: with only around forty surviving. A number of the surviving states made significant territorial gains (most notably Baden
column3: Bavaria
column4: and Hesse-Darmstadt); and Baden
column5: Hesse-Kassel
column6: and Württemberg gained status by being made electorates (to replace three that had been lost in the changes). Of the imperial cities
column7: only Augsburg
column8: Bremen
column9: Frankfurt am Main
column10: Hamburg
column11: Lübeck
column12: and Nuremberg survived as independent entities.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA402010;Reform the Empire;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME402020;The revolution is victorius once more;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC402020;Napoleon ist no longer the Emperor of the French;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA402020;Viva la revolution;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME402040;Peace of Pressburg;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC402040;The fourth Peace of Pressburg was signed on 26 December 1805 between France and Austria as a consequence of the Austrian defeats by France at Ulm and Austerlitz. Beyond the clauses establishing "peace and amity" and the Austrian withdrawal from the Third Coalition
column2: the treaty also took substantial European territories from Austria. The gains of the previous treaties of Campo Formio and Lunéville were reiterated and Austrian holdings in Italy and Bavaria were ceded to France. Certain Austrian holdings in Germany were passed to French allies: the King of Bavaria
column3: the King of Württemberg
column4: and the Elector of Baden. The most notable territorial exchanges concerned the Tyrol and Vorarlberg which went to Bavaria
column5: and Venetia
column6: Istria
column7: and Dalmatia which were incorporated in the Kingdom of Italy
column8: of which Napoleon had become king earlier that year. Augsburg was ceded to Bavaria. As a minor compensation
column9: Austria received the Electorate of Salzburg.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA402040;Finally Peace!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME402050;Das Reich ist nicht mehr!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC402050;The Empire was formally dissolved on 6 August 1806
column2: when the last Holy Roman Emperor Francis II abdicated
column3: following a military defeat by the French under Napoleon at Austerlitz (see Treaty of Pressburg). Napoleon reorganized much of the Empire into the Confederation of the Rhine
column4: a French satellite. Francis' House of Habsburg-Lorraine survived the demise of the Empire
column5: continuing to reign as Emperors of Austria and Kings of Hungary until the Habsburg empire's final dissolution in 1918 in the aftermath of World War I.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA402050;This is not the way it should have ended.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME402070;Napoleon dissolves the Holy Roman Empire;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC402070;Since Napoleon has occupied most of the Holy Roman Empire
column2: many former meber States have left the Empire and joind the Confederation of the Rhine. Although
column3: the Emperor remains formally in power.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA402070;What a shame!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME402080;Treaties of Tilsit;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC402080;The Treaties of Tilsit were two agreements signed by Napoleon I of France in the town of Tilsit in July
column2: 1807 in the aftermath of his victory at Friedland. The first was signed on 7 July
column3: between Tsar Alexander I of Russia and Napoleon I of France
column4: when they met on a raft in the middle of the Neman River. The second was signed with Prussia on 9 July. The treaties was made at the expense of the Prussian king
column5: who had already agreed to a truce on 25 June after the Grande Armée had pursued him to the easternmost frontier of his realm
column6: and in Tilsit ceded about half of his pre-war territories.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA402080;So shall it be.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC403000;Nepoleon defeated us
column2: but it seems to be a fair peace
column3: at least for us. The Emperor of the French
column4: offert us a "light peace"
column5: if we give him free hand in Prussia and become a part of the "Continental Blockade";;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME402090;Treaty of London;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC402090;Napoleon has invaded the english homeland and beated our defenses. Now
column2: we are forced to make peace with France. The Treaty of London demands
column3: that we secede Wessex
column4: Wales
column5: the Channel Islands and Gibraltar to France;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA402090;We will take revenge.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA403000;I like this Treaty.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME403040;Now its your time to decide!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC403040;Are you want to play
column2: a mostly scripted version of the Coalitions Wars
column3: or do you prefer free play?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA403040;The scripted version sounds intresting.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB403040;Go away with your scripts
column2: this is a sandbox game!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME403050;Our beloved Emperor is dead!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC403050;After 22 years of his rain
column2: as First Konsul of the Republic
column3: as well as as Emperor of the French
column4: Napoleon I. died in his Palace in Paris. Without any achievements of its own
column5: the new Emperor Napoléon François
column6: proclaimed as Napoleon II. had to make certain admission to the Bourgeoisie.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA403050;So this is the end
column2: of the Napoleonic Era?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME500000;Terrorists Destroy World Trade Centre;x;;;;;;;;;

EVTDESC500000;The world trade centre in our biggest city has this morning been the object of the worst and most extensive attack carried out on $COUNTRY_ADJ$ soil by terrorists. Hundreds are dead and many more are missing
column2: the city will take months before fully recovering and it is feared that the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ people will never fully recover from the shock
column3: this undoubtedly marks the beginning of a new era in international affairs. The suspected leader of the attack
column4: a member of a wealthy arabic family
column5: has reportedly fled to Afghanistan where islamic militants offered him refuge. Conservative elements in our nation call for swift and indiscriminate action against the suspects and a tightening of nation-wide security
column6: while the opposition urges caution in our response to these acts.;x;;;;;;;;;

column1: EVTOPTA500000;Commence War on Terror;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTOPTB500000;Let us not overreact;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTDESC660000_NEWS_LONG;It is Armageddon! A large asteroid has just crashed into the Earth and wiped out most life on the planet.;;;;;;x
EVTDESC660000_NEWS_MEDIUM;A large asteroid has just crashed into the Earth and wiped out most life on the planet!;;;;;;x
EVTDESC660000_NEWS_SHORT;A large asteroid has just crashed into the Earth!;;;;;;x
EVTNAME660000;Massive Asteroid Crashes into Earth;;;;;;x

EVTDESC660000;It is Armageddon! A large asteroid has just crashed into the Earth and wiped out most life on the planet. Luckily we saw it coming and moved the ruling class of the country to an underground bunker!;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA660000;We Shall Rebuild!;;;;;;x
EVTNAME660010;Massive Asteroid Crashes into Earth;;;;;;x

EVTDESC660010;It is Armageddon! A large asteroid has just crashed into the Earth and wiped out most life on the planet. Luckily we saw it coming and moved the ruling class of the country to an underground bunker!;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA660010;We Shall Rebuild!;;;;;;x
EVTNAME660020;$COUNTRY_ADJ$ Castaway Rescued;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTDESC660020;A $COUNTRY_ADJ$ national has been rescued from a tiny island in the middle of the ocean. His miraculous survival and rescue are inspiring people worldwide.;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTOPTA660020;Incredible;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;
EVTNAME666666;Nuclear Attack;;;;;;x
EVTDESC666666;$MONARCHTITLE$! $FROMCOUNTRY$ has carried out a nuclear strike on $COUNTRY_ADJ$ soil
column2: many of our citizens are dead and radiation hysteria has gripped our nation!;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA666666;Dear GOD! NO!;;;;;;x
EVTNAME666667;Radiation Contamination;;;;;;x;;
EVTDESC666667; Our health ministry has reported that fallout from the recent nuclear strike against us has contaminated a nearby province.;;;;;;x;;
EVTOPTA666667;Grim days indeed!;;;;;;x;;
EVTNAME800000;$MONARCHTITLE$
EVTNAME800001;Incoming Missiles Detected;;;;;;x

EVTDESC800001;$MONARCHTITLE$! Our early warning system has detected multiple nuclear missile launches in The Soviet Union and they appear to be heading our way! Our top generals advise swift retaliation while we still can. But others in our administration say we should wait for further confirmation. Something which
column2: as our generals pointed out
column3: may eliminate all possibility of a counter attack.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA800001;Await Confirmation;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB800001;Unleash Hell Upon Our Enemies!;;;;;;x
EVTNAME800100;Isaac Newton discovers gravity!;;;;;;x
EVTDESC800100;A man by the name of Sir Isaac Newton has figured out how gravity works and has developed a law to describe it. The way Newton discovered it
column2: however
column3: remains a mistery. Some say it happened when an apple dropped on his head. Nonetheless
column4: it is an incredible discovery.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA800100;He shall be remembered throughout history!;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB800100;Send him abroad;;;;;;x
EVTNAME800110;Nuclear fusion and fission;;;;;;x
EVTDESC800110;A man by the name of Albert Einstein has discovered nuclear fusion and nuclear fission. We are aware that
column2: when used with the purpose of harming
column3: this technology is extremely dangerous.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA800110;This is valuable research!;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB800110;We'll make money off of him!;;;;;;x
EVTNAME800120;Nazi scientists discovered in Berlin!;;;;;;x
EVTDESC800120;The Allies have captured Berlin and found the masterminds behind the Nazi war machine. Their hard work and research has almost brought a Nazi victory to the world
column2: but through the efforts of the Allied faction they have been stopped. Clearly
column3: we can spare them and use them for our own purposes.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA800120;Good.;;;;;;x
EVTNAME800130;Nazi scientists discovered in Berlin!;;;;;;x
EVTDESC800130;Comrade! Our glorious Red Army divisions have captured Berlin and found the filthy Nazi scientist pigs. What shall we do?;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA800130;They will contribute to our cause.;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB800130;Order their immediate assassination!;;;;;;x
EVTNAME900001;Slavery in African countries;;;;;;x
EVTDESC900001;We have realised that
column2: by organising a slave state in our country
column3: we can both make a profit and establish a better relationship with foreign nations.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA900001;We will crack the whip!;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB900001;Our people are free
column2: and shall remain free!;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME999000;Trade Policy Debate;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999000;The intensive election campaign has reached the boiling point in $COUNTRY$
column2: where a fierce trade policy debate pits the friends of free trade against the pals of protectionism in a rough rumble-and-tumble to determine the future of our nation's traders. Free-traders argue that goods must be allowed to freely cross all borders
column3: while protectionists argue that our nation's fragile industries need protection from dangerous foreign competition threatening to undo them. Which path will $COUNTRY$ tread
column4: as it decides on: Free trade
column5: or Protectionism? We report
column6: you decide.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999000;Our trade must be protected from destructive foreign competition!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999000;Let the debate take its own course
column2: and let the chips fall where they may!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTC999000;Freedom and liberty of trade shall not perish from this Earth!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999001;Economic Policy Debate;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999001;The debate had been going on for several hours
column2: when a candidate stepped forward and presented the arguments for their cause which silenced all opponents.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999001;Decisive arguments for Laissez Faire.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999001;Decisive arguments for Interventionism.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC999001;Decisive arguments for State Capitalism.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTD999001;Decisive arguments for Planned Economy.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999002;Religious Policy Debate;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC999002;'The morality and virtue of our people have started to decline!'' This statement caused much stir among the debaters of toleration and religious plurality. They have started to question the country''s view on religion.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA999002;There are no Gods!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999002;Religion is not a political issue!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC999002;Let the people have their faith.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTD999002;There is one faith and one faith only!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999003;Citizenship Policy Debate;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999003;Two debaters are arguing heatedly about their views. The rest of the hall sits dumbfounded when words like aliens
column2: minorities
column3: ethnic and cultural groups are thrown between the two. One wish that immigrants should adapt to the dominant culture while the other believes that they should retain their cultural heritage.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999003;Give them residency.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999003;We need to limit their citizenship.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC999003;Let them have full citizenship.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999004;War Policy Debate ;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999004;Patriots and pacifists are fighting in the townhouse
column2: using words to hurt and kill their enemies. A long since dead and buried dispute between $COUNTRY$ and its neighbor has once again shown its ugly head. Patriots wish to invade the country while pacifists believe that there are other ways to resolve the dispute.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999004;We are patriots and we are going to fight for our country!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999004;Violence can be used
column2: but in this situation it would be meaningless.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTC999004;War between countries is never good.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTD999004;This can be solved without violence.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999010;Political Parties Campaign Of $YEAR$;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999010;The political parties in $COUNTRY$ have started a nationwide election campaign. So far
column2: the effects have been quite limited
column3: but in the end
column4: one party will gain the upper hand. However
column5: we could also try to tip the scales ourselves...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999010;Support the Conservative parties!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999010;Support the Reactionary parties!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC999010;Support the Liberal parties!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTD999010;Let the campaigns take their course and do not intervene.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTNAME999020;Calm Elections;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC999020;The remaining elections of $YEAR$ where unusually quite. The political parties had no important issues to talk about and the whole election passed without any significant debates or events.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA999020;There shall be peace and quite in our time.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999021;Violent Elections;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999021;The elections of $YEAR$ where unusually violent. Only a few days after the campaigns had started
column2: the first incidents happened. Strikes occured in several large factories
column3: streetfighting started in most major cities. Paramilitary groups threatened voters of opposing ideologies
column4: radicals staged attacks on political enemies. The police worked tirelessly to get the situation under control
column5: but it looked like $COUNTRY$ was in for a hot election.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC999022;The tensions from the current election campaigns have escalated and disorder is spreading fast in $COUNTRY$. We have to do something! We can either act immediately or wait a few more days until some of the steam has vented. Or we make a cunning plan and blame one of the more radical parties. So
column2: what should we do?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999022;Take control of the situation NOW!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999022;Let them lose some steam and act LATER!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC999022;Blame the Liberals and try to ban them from the election!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTOPTB999028;Let them lose some steam and act LATER!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC999028;Blame the Socialists and try to ban them from the election!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTD999028;Blame the Communists and try to ban them from the election!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999030;Surge Of Socialism;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC999030;It looks like the socialists have a talent in the current election to find the right words when and where they are needed: All over $COUNTRY$ their new agenda has persuaded a lot of people to join their cause.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA999030;We will have an eye on this.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999031;Surge Of Communism;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999031;It looks like the communists have a talent in the current election to find the right words when and where they are needed: All over $COUNTRY$
column2: their new agenda has persuaded a lot of people to join their cause.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC999032;It looks like the fascists have a talent in the current election to find the right words when and where they are needed: All over$COUNTRY$
column2: their new agenda has persuaded a lot of people to join their cause.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999032;We will have an eye on this.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999033;Surge Of Liberalism;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC999033;It looks like the liberals have a talent in the current election to find the right words when and where they are needed: All over $COUNTRY$ their new agenda has persuaded a lot of people to join their cause.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA999031;We will have an eye on this.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999040;Voting Rights Discussion;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999040;'Why should only the rich be allowed to vote? We also pay taxes
column2: so why shouldn't we have something to say in politics?' \n The industrial revolution has empowered the middle class. More and more businessmen are making more and more money. It seems only natural that they demand voting rights.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999040;They are right - support their reform.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999040;Voting rights for the middle class? Nay!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC999040;A reform is long past due - issue a new voting right.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999041;Voting Rights Discussion;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999041;'...and mind you
column2: we even pay way higher taxes then they do! Still
column3: their votes are worth more than ours - I ask you: is that really fair?' \n While being allowed to vote
column4: the middle class feels diminished by the current weighted voting rights. Maybe we should issue a reform to make all their votes equal?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999041;Sounds like a good idea
EVTOPTB999041;Stop these ungrateful wretches!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC999041;We shall do this right away!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999042;Voting Rights Discussion;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999042;'Why is everyone trying to keep us out of politics? Because we are uneducated? They call us minors
column2: but that is a lie! Our sweet and toil has brought the nation forward! We have waited long enough - now we demand our just due!' \n It looks like the poor finally demand voting rights. Maybe we should grant them a voice?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999042;Better late then never.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999042;Better never than ever.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC999042;Better now than later.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999043;Voting Rights Discussion;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999043;'We hold these truths to be self-evident
column2: that all men are created equal
column3: that they are endowed by their Creator with certain unalienable Rights
column4: that among these are Life
column5: Liberty
column6: and the Pursuit of Happiness. That to secure these rights
column7: Governments are instituted among Men
column8: deriving their just powers from the consent of the governed' \n - Thomas Jefferson;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999043;A rightful initiative.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999043;Enough is enough! Stop that nonsense!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC999043;Equal votes for equal chances - NOW!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999044;Right In The Face;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999044;'They have beaten me
column2: again and again. Why? Because I am a proud citizen who will speak the truth! I don't believe that the ruling party will save us. And my weapon is logic
column3: but theirs is the stick.';;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999044;This has to stop!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999044;Go cry me a river.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999045;Election Fraud!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999045;'Why are they allowed to change the rules during an election? Drawing random borders to scatter those who won't vote for them is not fair. It is fraud
column2: I tell you! They divided our district between four others
column3: because they knew how we would vote. FRAUD! That's what it is

column1: EVTOPTA999045;You are right
column2: we have to do something.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTB999045;Want me to play the world's smallest violin?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999046;Request For Privacy;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999046;'Why does everyone stare at me when I make my vote? Do they really need to know? It is not like I am committing a crime or something
column2: I simply want to vote in peace. Without having half of the polling station looking at me

column1: EVTOPTA999046;I guess some privacy would be in order.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999046;What's next? Blindfolds?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999047;Social Reform Movement;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC999047;The socialists have started a countrywide drive for social reforms in $COUNTRY$. Their methods are new and the law about them is rather ambiguous. Should we allow them to continue their campaign?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA999047;Allow them to carry on.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999047;Ban the campaign.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999048;Social Reform Movement;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC999048;Socialists and communists have started a countrywide drive for social reforms in $COUNTRY$. Their methods are new and the law about them is rather ambiguous. Should we allow them to continue their campaign?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA999048;Allow them to carry on.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999048;Ban the campaign.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999049;Unemployment Issues;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999049;The election is almost over
column2: but liberals and socialists are still arguing about the current state of affairs. Unemployment is a problem
column3: but both sides have decisive arguments for what they think has to be done.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999049;The liberals are right!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999049;The socialists are right!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999050;Unemployment Issues;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999050;Unemployment is still an important issue in $COUNTRY$
column2: but all our recent attempts to crate new jobs have failed. During the election of $YEAR$
column3: communists and fascists argued that their dogma is the only one that will give work to the people.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999050;Communism is our only hope!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999050;Fascism is our only hope!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999100;Wartime Radicalisation ;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999100;Our recent victories in the current war have driven our population towards a more aggressive war agenda.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA999100;The world shall be ours!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999101;Devestating Defeats;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999101;Our recent defeats in the current war have made our population weary. They want peace - at any price.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA999101;Swords to Plowshares.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999102;Draft Riots;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC999102;Everything was normal in the barracks of $CAPITAL$. The lottery had designated the new men that were to be drafted into the army. Suddenly: Outrage! Thousands of people filling the streets
column2: protesting against the current conscription laws and the war itself. Police dispersed the crowd
column3: but they said they will be back. What shall we do?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999102;Arrest the troublemakers and contiue the drafts.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999102;They have a point - postpone the drafts for now.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999103;Patriotic Movement;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999103;This is not only our war son
column2:
it is your war too! 
 Join the army! Fight for your country! 
 It is a patriot's duty! 
 BE A PATRIOT!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999103;For $COUNTRY$!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999104;Peace Rally;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999104;The war was over - the results devestating. Had we won? Had we lost? No one could really tell. \n All we knew was: There should be no war
column2: nevermore. We have paid our price - now let us make the world a better place. A safe place for our children. \n  Let the doves fly to our neighbours to bring them the message of a new dawn
column3: let us tell them: the day of everlasting peace has arrived!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999104;Et in terra pax.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999105;Revanchism;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999105;They have taken our land. Our rightful soil. It rightfully belongs to us - and if they won't give it to us
column2: we shall take it by force!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999105;To war
EVTOPTB999105;This piece of land isn't worth the trouble.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999106;Revanchism;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999106;They have taken our land. Our rightful soil. It rightfully belongs to us - and if they won't give it to us
column2: we shall take it by force! And Fascism will lead the way - the way to victory!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999106;To war
EVTOPTB999106;This piece of land isn't worth the trouble.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999107;General Assassinated! ;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999107;The general stood next to the door of the garrison
column2: the attack came unexpected. A soldier had grabbed a pistol and fired several shots at him
column3: the general had no chance. The guards rushed to aid him
column4: shot the attacker
column5: but it was too late. \n But what seemed to be pointless murder soon turned out to be some sort of desperate retaliation. Something is wrong in our miliary
column6: truth be told: A lot is wrong. But who is to blame?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999107;Blame the soldiers!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999107;Blame the officers!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999110;Exceptional Year;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999110;$YEAR$ was a great year. In fact
column2: it was the best year of the last decade. The weather was marvelous
column3: the harvest a huge success. Our economy was booming and it seems everyone had gotten their share. The people are happy and content - at least for now.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999110;Excellent!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999111;Tax Protests;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999111;We can't pay these taxes! We are already starving
column2: how much more shall we pay? \n It seems that our taxation is too heavy for the poor. They cannot cope with this burden - we must do something
column3: or these tax protests will spread all over the country!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999111;We will think about something.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999112;Tax Protests;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC999112;How much more shall we pay? Why can't a hard working man keep the fruit of his work? \n It seems that our taxation is too heavy for the middle class. They cannot cope with this burden - we must do something
column2: or these tax protests will spread all over the country!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999112;We will think about something.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999113;Tax Protests;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999113;It is a joke! I can barely pay upkeep for my business
column2: let alone pay for my house. If this continues
column3: I will live under a bridge by next month! \n It seems that our taxation is too heavy for the rich. They cannot cope with this burden - we must do something
column4: or these tax protests will spread all over the country!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999113;We will think about something.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999114;Tax Protests Escalate;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999114;The people are outraged by the current tax levels. Frustration has turned into violence and people are protesting on the street. Police has tried to remove them by force
column2: but it seems that wide parts of the population have solidarized with them! We must do something!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999114;As I said: We will think about something.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999120;The Old Order Is In Danger!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999120;The communists have gained quite some influence in our country. We must be vigilant
column2: since this can turn into a dangeous situation for our government. You know about their dreams of the communist utopia - if we let this go on
column3: they might want to lay the foundation it in $COUNTRY$...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999120;We will think of some countermeasures.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999121;The Old Order Is In Danger!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999121;The fascists have gained quite some influence in our country. We must be vigilant
column2: since this can turn into a dangeous situation for our government. You know about their dreams of a fascist state - if we let this go on
column3: the masses might join their cause!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999121;We will think of some countermeasures.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999122;The New Order Is In Danger!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999122;Reactionaries have gained more and more influence lately. People are growing tired of all the new things we have brought to $COUNTRY$. We should start to improve the conditions
column2: or they will force us to do things 'the old way'.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999122;We will think of some countermeasures.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999123;Beware Of The Wealthy!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999123;The recent years have made the rich ever richer - and with money comes power. We must be vigilant
column2: because these rich individuals do not only want money - they also want the power. If we allow them to gain more support from the population
column3: the situation could soon turn sour for us...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999123;We will think of some countermeasures.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999124;The Revolt Of The Masses;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC999124;We have failed. There are red flags are everywhere. The people have given up trust and hope in the current government. And the communists have made their final move and are marching for the $CAPITAL$. If we mobilize the remaining loyal soldiers we might have a chance
column2: but are we really willing to pay this price?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999124;We will never surrender! Use all means to fight them back!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999124;We will not spill the blood of our people. Step down and let them take over.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999125;The Third Way Will Win;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC999125;We have failed. The black shirts are everywhere. The people have given up trust and hope in the current government. And the fascists have made their final move and are marching for the $CAPITAL$. If we mobilize the remaining loyal soldiers we might have a chance
column2: but are we really willing to pay this price?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC999128;We have failed. The bourgeois is everywhere. The people have given up trust and hope in the current government. And the anarcho-liberals have made their final move and are marching for $CAPITAL$ If we mobilize the remaining loyal soldiers we might have a chance
column2: but are we really willing to pay this price?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTOPTB999128;We will not spill the blood of our people. Step down and let them take over.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999130;Communism Is Victorious!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999130;A whisper goes around the world:\n Worker
column2:
don't you hear it?
 These are the voices of war ministers:
 Worker don't you hear them?
 The whispering comes from all continents:
 Mobilization against the revolution!
 Workers
column3: peasants
column4: Arm yourselves
column5:
Arm yourselves with guns.
 Set all Hearts on Fire!
 Plant your Red banners of Labor
 On every ramp
column6:
on every factory.
 Rising from the ruins
 Of the old society
 The socialist World Republic!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999130;Comrads
EVTNAME999131;Fascism Is Victorious!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999131;We have won! \n Nobody thought we had a chance
column2: but our great leader has overcome them all! \n The power is ours - and from this day on
column3: $COUNTRY$ will rise to bring the world a new order! \n The third way is victorious!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999131;Hail to our glorious leader!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999132;Return Of The King!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999132;The royal family had lost it's power for far too long. Now it is restored - and the new king shall bestow his grace upon $COUNTRY$ once more!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA999132;Long live the king!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999133;All Power To El Presidente!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999133;"This is TNT
column2: your brand new state newspaper
column3: and I am Juanito
column4: your new favorite news article writer! \n For today's headliner
column5:
we have the amazing story of El Presidente and his way to power! 
 It all started back in... [...] 

 And remember folks: Don't read this so called ""newspaper"" from Betty Boom - it is filled with anti-patriotic lies against our great El Presidente!";;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999133;Long live El Presidente!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAME999134;The Bourgeois Is Victorious!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999134;Money makes right - and we have proven it once and for all! Finally we can have our rightful taste of the sweet fruits of power. \n Jeeves
column2: bring us  some wine so we can celebrate this occasion.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999134;Cheers!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: in reality once London fell there was little resistance overseas. The island of Great Britain is now at our mercy and the British will lose their Empire to local native governments should we choose to annex it. Alternatively we can offer the British crown to Edward VIII
column3: a Royal Nazi sympathiser. The former Royal family having fled to Canada.;;;;;;x

EVTDESC1000014;My $MONARCHTITLE$
column2: We have occupied Moscow and the Russian leadership has formally surrendered. This vast country is now at our mercy!;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME1000017;The Munich Agreement;;;;;;x
EVTDESC1000017;In May 1938
column2: Lord Halifax outlined a plan to the Czech ambassador in London where Germany would annex the Sudetenland
column3: while remaining areas of Czechoslovakia would be internationally guaranteed and no longer bound to then current millitary alliance treaties. The plan was imposed on the Czechs at Munich on September 30th. As the British public was not in favor of turning Germany into a bulwark against communism
column4: the British government produced propaganda which grossly exaggerated the German military capabilities
column5: while marginalizing the military capabilities of Czechoslovakia and the Soviet Union. Most people were successfully convinced that going to war with Germany would be suicide and Czechoslovakia would lose almost immediately. In this game you can instead choose to stand with Czechoslovakia and France in order to defeat Germany.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA1000017;Historical Agreement;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB1000017;Defend Czechoslovakia;;;;;;x
EVTDESC1000018;Britain is supporting the Munich agreement where Germany would annex the Sudetenland
column2: while remaining areas of Czechoslovakia would be internationally guaranteed and no longer bound to then current millitary alliance treaties. France did not want to go to war without the support of Britain
column3: but in this game you can attempt to defend Czechoslovakia.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1000019;Britain and France are supporting the Munich agreement where Germany would annex the Sudetenland
column2: while remaining areas of Czechoslovakia would be internationally guaranteed and no longer bound to then current millitary alliance treaties. Historically
column3: Czechoslovakia was not willing to fight Germany without allies
column4: but in this game you can attempt to defend your country against Germany.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME1000100;First Turko-Egyptian War;;;;;;x
EVTDESC1000100;As a reward for his assistance to Sultan Mahmud II in Greece
column2: Egyptian ruler Muhammad Ali demanded control of Syria. Mahmud rejected this demand. In response
column3: Muhammad Ali picked a quarrel with the Pasha of Acre
column4: and sent the Egyptian army in 1831 to occupy the country
column5: which started the First Turko-Egyptian War;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA1000100;Take what is rightfully ours with the Egyptian army!;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB1000100;The Ottoman army is stronger than ours.;;;;;;x
EVTNAME1000101;Peace Agreement of Kütahya;;;;;;x
EVTDESC1000101;The Egyptian army defeated the Ottoman army and threatened Istanbul. Under the terms of the Peace Agreement of Kütahya
column2: the Sultan ceded greater Syria to Muhammad Ali for his lifetime. Muhammad Ali's dynasty would rule Egypt in perpetuity
column3: with nominal vassalhood to the Ottoman Sultan. The Peace Agreement was not satisfactory to either party
column4: resulting in the Second Ottoman-Egyptian War in 1839.;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA1000101;Sign the agreement;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB1000101;Continue the war.;;;;;;x

EVTDESC4088789;The masses of the planet look in awe and fear as the Russian government declares the Federation dead and the USSR returned. Neighboring governments have quickly begun militarizing the border as it appears that the Cold War may be coming back to us.;;;;;;x
ev_20000000;Kepler's Supernova;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000000;Supernova 1604
column2: also known as Kepler's Supernova
column3: Kepler's Nova or Kepler's Star
column4: was a supernova that occurred in the Milky Way
column5: in the constellation Ophiuchus. Appearing in 1604
column6: it is the most recent supernova to have been unquestionably observed by the naked eye in our own galaxy
column7: occurring no farther than 6 kiloparsecs or about 20
column8: 000 light-years from Earth.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000001;Shakespeare's First Performance;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000001;"Shakespeare was an English poet
column2: playwright and actor
column3: widely regarded as the greatest writer in the English language and the world's pre-eminent dramatist. He is often called England's national poet and the ""Bard of Avon"". His extant works
column4: including some collaborations
column5: consist of about 38 plays
column6: 154 sonnets
column7: two long narrative poems
column8: and a few other verses
column9: the authorship of some of which is uncertain. His plays have been translated into every major living language and are performed more often than those of any other playwright.";;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000002;Table Alphabeticall Published;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000002;A Table Alphabeticall is the abbreviated title of the first monolingual dictionary in English
column2: created by Robert Cawdrey and first published in London in 1604.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000003;Dun Quixote Published;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000003;Dun Quixote is a Spanish novel by Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra. It follows the adventures of Alonso Quixano
column2: an hidalgo who reads so many chivalric novels that he decides to set out to revive chivalry
column3: under the name Don Quixote. He recruits a simple farmer
column4: Sancho Panza
column5: as his squire
column6: who often employs a unique
column7: earthly wit in dealing with Don Quixote's rhetorical orations on antiquated knighthood. Don Quixote is met by the world as it is
column8: initiating such themes as intertextuality
column9: realism
column10: metatheatre
column11: and literary representation.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000004;We Are Ruled by England!;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000004;Due to their upper hand in strength and their power projection to us we have no other possibility
column2: but to bow before our English overlords;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000005;Ireland Belongs to Us!;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000005;The leaders of Ireland have finally bowed before us
column2: becoming our legitimate vassals.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000006;Year of Three Popes;;;;;;x;;

desc_ev_20000006;The Year of Three Popes is a common reference to a year when the College of Cardinals of the Catholic Church are required to elect two new popes within the same calendar year. Such a year generally occurs when a newly elected pope dies or resigns very early into his papacy. This results in the Catholic Church being led by three different popes during the same calendar year.;;;;;;x;;
ev_20000007;Catholics Expelled!;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000007;Due to our new overlords we have to expel every catholic citizen of our country. They left the isles for France in hope of finding a place that accepts them.;;;;;;x;;
ev_20000008;The First Newspaper!;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000008;The first german language newspaper has been printed the first time and from this year onwards by Johann Carolus in Strasbourg
column2: is often recognized as the first newspaper.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000009;Gunpowder Plot;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000009;The Gunpowder Plot of 1605
column2: in earlier centuries often called the Gunpowder Treason Plot or the Jesuit Treason
column3: was a failed assassination attempt against King James I of England and VI of Scotland by a group of provincial English Catholics led by Robert Catesby. The plan was to blow up the House of Lords during the State Opening of England's Parliament on 5 November 1605. The plot was revealed to the authorities in an anonymous letter sent to William Parker
column4: 4th Baron Monteagle
column5: on 26 October 1605. During a search of the House of Lords at about midnight on 4 November 1605
column6: Fawkes was discovered guarding 36 barrels of gunpowder?enough to reduce the House of Lords to rubble?and arrested. Most of the conspirators fled from London as they learned of the plot's discovery
column7: trying to enlist support along the way.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000010;Irish College Established;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000010;The Irish College in Paris was for three centuries a major Roman Catholic educational establishment
column2: for Irish students. It is now an Irish cultural centre
column3: the Centre Culturel Irlandais;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000011;Willem Janszoon Discovers Australia;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000011;Willem Janszoon
column2: Dutch navigator and colonial governor
column3: is the first European known to have seen the coast of Australia. On 26 February 1606
column4: he made landfall at the Pennefather River on the western shore of Cape York in Queensland
column5: near the modern town of Weipa. This is the first recorded European landfall on the Australian continent.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000013;"James VI of Scotland had inherited the English and Irish thrones in 1603 as James I
column2: thereby uniting the crowns of England
column3: Scotland
column4: and Ireland in a personal union
column5: although the three kingdoms remained separate states. On 12 April 1606
column6: a new flag to represent this regal union between England and Scotland was specified in a royal decree
column7: according to which the flag of England (a red cross on a white background
column8: known as St George's Cross)
column9: and the flag of Scotland (a white saltire on a blue background
column10: known as the Saltire or St Andrew's Cross)
column11: would be joined together
column12: forming the flag of England and Scotland for maritime purposes. King James also began to refer to a ""Kingdom of Great Britaine""
column13: although the Union remained a personal one.";;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000014;Evangelic Lyceum Founded in Bratislava;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000014;Evangelic Lutheran Lyceum in Bratislava
column2: Slovakia
column3: was founded in 1606 by David Kilger as a Lutheran high school. Until 1656 was Evangelical Lyceum a school with eight classes
column4: two of them elementary school. Among its students
column5: from 1829 to 1836
column6: was the young ?udov?t ?t?r
column7: who became a member of Czech-Slav Society at the school
column8: an important influence on his life as a Slovak nationalist.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000015;San Augstin Church Finished in Manila!;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000015;San Agustin Church was the first religious structure constructed by the Spaniards on the island of Luzon. Made of bamboo and nipa
column2: it was completed in 1571
column3: but destroyed by fire in December
column4: 1574 during the attempted invasion of Manila by the forces of Limahong.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000016;Monteverdi's L'Orfeo Debuts;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000016;L'Orfeo
column2: sometimes called L'Orfeo
column3: favola in musica
column4: is a late Renaissance/early Baroque opera by Claudio Monteverdi
column5: with a libretto by Alessandro Striggio. It is based on the Greek legend of Orpheus
column6: and tells the story of his descent to Hades and his fruitless attempt to bring his dead bride Eurydice back to the living world. It was written in 1607 for a court performance during the annual Carnival at Mantua.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000017;First Jesuit Mission in Mexico;;;;;;x;;

desc_ev_20000017;The Society of Jesus is a Christian male religious congregation of the Catholic Church. The members are called Jesuits. The society is engaged in evangelization and apostolic ministry in 112 nations on six continents. Jesuits work in education (founding schools
column2: colleges
column3: universities and seminaries)
column4: intellectual research
column5: and cultural pursuits. Jesuits also give retreats
column6: minister in hospitals and parishes and promote social justice and ecumenical dialogue.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000019;First Telescope!;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000019;"The practical exploitation of the instrument was certainly achieved and came to public attention in the Netherlands at about 1608
column2: but the credit of the original invention has been claimed on behalf of three individuals: Hans Lippershey and Sacharias Jansen?spectacle-makers in Middelburg
column3: and Jacob Metius of Alkmaar (also known as Jacob Adriaanszoon). Hans Lippershey was credited with creating and disseminating designs for the first practical telescope?later applying to the States General of the Netherlands on October 2
column5: for a patent for an instrument ""for seeing things far away as if they were nearby
column6: (beating Jacob Metius's patent by a few weeks). Lippershey failed to receive a patent since the same claim for invention had been made by other spectacle-makers. Lippershey was handsomely rewarded by the Dutch government for copies of his design. Sacharias Jansen's design for a telescope may have pre-dated Lippershey and Metius
column7: but the invention was never widely publicized.";;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000020;Old Bushmills Distillery Founded;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000020;A new distillery of whiskey has been founded in Ireland
column2: of course all of the whiskey bottled under the Bushmills whiskey brand is produced at the Bushmills Distillery. A licence to distill in the area was granted to Sir Thomas Phillipps in 1608 by King James I
column3: and the 1608 date is printed on the labels of the Bushmills brand whiskey. It uses water drawn from Saint Columb's Rill which is a tributary of the River Bush. The Bushmills Distillery claims to be?and is almost unanimously considered to be?the oldest licensed distillery in the world.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000021;Basque Witch Trials;;;;;;x;;

desc_ev_20000021;The Basque witch trials of the 17th century represent the most ambitious attempt at rooting out witchcraft ever undertaken by the Spanish Inquisition. The trial of the Basque witches at Logro?o
column2: near Navarre
column3: in northern Spain
column4: which began in January 1609
column5: against the background of similar persecutions conducted in Labourd by Pierre de Lancre
column6: was almost certainly the biggest single event of its kind in history.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000022;Bank of Amsterdam Founded;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000022;The Bank of Amsterdam was an early bank
column2: vouched for by the city of Amsterdam
column3: established in 1609
column4: the precursor to
column5: if not the first
column6: modern central bank.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000023;Freedom of Religion in Bohemia;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000023;Freedom of religion or Freedom of belief is a principle that supports the freedom of an individual or community
column2: in public or private
column3: to manifest religion or belief in teaching
column4: practice
column5: worship
column6: and observance. In 1609 Emperor Rudolf II granted Bohemia greater religious liberty with his Letter of Majesty.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000024;New Capital City!;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000024;Due to its central location between the Commonwealth's capitals of Krak?w and Vilnius
column2: Warsaw became the capital of the Commonwealth and the Crown of the Kingdom of Poland. In the following years the town expanded towards the suburbs. Several private independent districts were established
column3: the property of aristocrats and the gentry
column4: which were ruled by their own laws.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000025;Kepler's First Two Laws;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000025;Johannes Kepler published his first two laws about planetary motion in 1609
column2: having found them by analyzing the astronomical observations of Tycho Brahe. The first one was that
column3: the orbit of every planet is an ellipse with the Sun at one of the two foci. The second one was that a line joining a planet and the Sun sweeps out equal areas during equal intervals of time.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000026;Colegio de Nuestra Senora del Santisimo Rosario Established;;;;;;x;;

desc_ev_20000026;The University of Santo Tomas is one of the oldest existing universities and holds the oldest extant university charter in the Philippines and in Asia. It was originally conceived as a school to prepare young men for the priesthood. Located within Intramuros
column2: the Walled City
column3: it was first called Colegio de Nuestra Se?ora del Sant?simo Rosario and later renamed Colegio de Santo Tom?s in memory of Dominican theologian Saint Thomas Aquinas.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000027;Nagoya Castle Complete;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000027;Nagoya Castle is a Japanese castle located in Nagoya
column2: central Japan. During the Edo period
column3: Nagoya Castle was the center of one of the most important castle towns in Japan?Nagoya-juku? and it included the most important stops along the Minoji
column4: which linked the T?okaido with the Nakasendo.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000028;Globe Theatre Burns Down!;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000028;The Globe Theatre was a theatre in London associated with William Shakespeare. It was built in 1599 by Shakespeare's playing company
column2: the Lord Chamberlain's Men
column3: on land owned by Thomas Brend and inherited by his son
column4: Nicholas Brend and grandson Sir Matthew Brend
column5: and was destroyed by fire on 29 June 1613.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000029;University of Groningen Founded;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000029;The University of Groningen
column2: located in the city of Groningen
column3: was founded in 1614. It is one of the oldest universities in the Netherlands as well as one of its largest. Since its inception more than 200
column4: 000 students have graduated. It is a member of the distinguished international Coimbra Group of European universities.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000030;Christianity Banned in Japan;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000030;Every outsider and Japanese citizen must leave or convert into the true faith of shintoism inside our borders or face dire consequences.;;;;;;x;;
ev_20000031;Wignacourt Aquaduct Finished in Malta;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000031;The Wignacourt Aqueduct in Malta is a very old building
column2: running through Balzan
column3: Birkirkara
column4: Fleur-de-Lys and Santa Venera. This was built by the Order of Saint John from 1610 to carry water from Dingli and Rabat to Valletta. The Aqueduct was inaugurated on 21 April 1615 and it remained in use until the 20th century. It is named after Alof de Wignacourt
column5: the Grandmaster who financed its building.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000032;David Gareja Monastery Looted;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000032;With the downfall of the Georgian monarchy
column2: the monastery suffered a lengthy period of decline and devastation by the Mongol army (1265)
column3: but was later restored by the Georgian kings. It survived the Safavid attack of 1615
column4: when the monks were massacred and the monastery's unique manuscripts and important works of Georgian art destroyed
column5: to be resurrected under Onopre Machutadze
column6: who was appointed Father Superior of David Gareja in 1690.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000033;Mayon Volcano Erupts!;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000033;The volcano of Mayon that recently became active again has finally erupted
column2: leading to the death of many of our people
column3: even though we did everything what we could to protect them.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000034;Guido Reni's Pieta;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000034;Guido Reni was an Italian painter of high-Baroque style. His Pieta is a well-recognized work of art both between and outside of our borders.;;;;;;x;;
ev_20000036;Collegium Musicum in Prague;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000036;The Collegium Musicum
column2: an institute created solely for the developement of music and teaching musicians has been established in Prague.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000039;Faculty of Medicine and Surgery Established;;;;;;x;;

desc_ev_20000039;The well-known University of Sassari has been expanded with a new faculty that allows the future generations of high education to learn the ways of medication and surgery to help our people through times of hardship.;;;;;;x;;
