desc_ev_20000255;An earthquake has shaken the city of Lisbon leading to countless death
column2: destruction and chaos. We try to help the situation as well as we can
column3: but sadly we can barely do anything.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000256;Puning Temple Complex Finished;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000256;A new temple complex in Chengde has been completed
column2: commonly referred to as the Big Buddha Temple. It was built in order to show the Qing's respect towards the Tibetan Buddhism. It is one of the Eight Outer Temples
column3: modelled after the Tibetan Potala Palace.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000257;New Agricultural Reform;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000257;Frederick II has passed a new reform concerning the agriculture. With multiple laws he forced the plantation of the new vegetable
column2: potato because of its low needs and high growth rate.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000258;British Museum Opens;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000258;The British Museum
column2: a large architecture has opened to show the historical collection of our nation to the people of our nation. It includes relics of our past and what we brought back from the New World and India.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000259;Sikh Holocaust;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000259;On the order of our emperor our people started the complete butchery of the Sikh people between our borders following their nation's
column2: Punjab's countless invasions.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000263;We have been following the ways of our ancestors to create vodka for a long time
column2: but with the innovations and inventions of the eras we have to move forward. Our empress Catherine II has given out the order to produce the vodka in a new
column3: improved way
column4: allowing larger output with less input.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000264;Beast Attacks;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000264;Beasts of unknown origin have started attacking villages around the country
column2: killing innocents. Some think that this is a punishment from God
column3: some more racional people say that these are no beasts
column4: but wolves
column5: driven to the villages because of their hunger.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000265;Grand Tour of Mozart;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000265;A prominent young boy called Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart has started his tour from our country to Western Europe
column2: to spread his magnificient music everywhere
column3: learning from the local cultures on the way.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000266;Free Press;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000266;Our nation just became the first to allow their people a completely free press
column2: without any central censorship
column3: letting anyone to start their own journal
column4: newspaper
column5: magazine with any kind of content.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000267;Corsica Lost;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000267;As the French has been owning the island of Corsica de facto for a while now we did what we could to still get the most out of it
column2: and selled the de jure ownership of it to the French. We didn't actually lose anything
column3: apart from a de jure casus belli
column4: but we gained some money to improve our nation instead.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000268;Royal Academy of Arts Founded;;;;;;x;;

desc_ev_20000268;The royal academy of arts has been founded through a personal act of our king to promote the arts of design in Britain through education and exhibitions and to encourage appreciation and interest in the public towards fine art.;;;;;;x;;
ev_20000269;Steam Engine Granted Patent;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000269;The steam engine of James Watt
column2: an invention capable of turning heat into energy has been created by engineer James Watt and now it was granted royal patent to begin production for the first time.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000270;With the bad crops of the recent years and the drought of this year our people are suffering
column2: trying to survive from day to day with what little food they have. News of cannibalism has reached the palace
column3: and even the leading nobles of our country fear what's coming next.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000272;Plague Returns;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000272;A new plague has reached the city of Moscow
column2: a large part of the local population. The disease didn't spare anyone
column3: nobles and commoners died all the same. This is a sad day of our nation.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000273;Putuo Zondcheng Temple Complex Complete;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000273;A new temple complex in Chengde has been completed. It was built in order to show the Qing's respect towards the Tibetan Buddhism. It is one of the Eight Outer Temples
column2: modelled after the Tibetan Potala Pala. It is the largest of the complexes
column3: covering 220.000 square meters.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000274;Absolute Rulership Declared;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000274;Our king
column2: Gustav III has finally declared absolute rulership after completely removing the parliament from power slowly
column3: but surely. This will allow him to reach the country's resources way easier.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000276;Istanbul Technical University Founded;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000276;A new high level education facility
column2: the Technical University of Istanbul has been established
column3: allowing some of our students to turn their interest to science
column4: and granting us a greater scientific output.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000277;Louis XVI Crowned;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000277;Louis XVI
column2: a new king has been crowned in our kingdom. He grew up in a new era
column3: the Enlightenment
column4: so we can expect him to fulfill the greatness our nation expects from him.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000278;Wealth of Nations Published;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000278;Adam Smith's so far greatest wokr
column2: the Wealth of Nations has been published. It is the world's first collected discriptions of what builds nations' wealth and may become an important part of the future's economics.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000279;Illuminati Founded;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000279;A branch of the free masons have separated
column2: creating a secret organization
column3: called the Illuminati. They set their goal to conquer the whole world and establish a New World Order. Apart from their scary goal
column4: they seem to keep to themselves.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_200002835;League of Armed Neutrality;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_200002835;After the recent conflicts in Europe and the somewhat stable relations with the northern countries we chose to sign a treaty with them
column2: the League of Armed Neutrality. This is not an alliance
column3: but it means that we accept the current borders we have and will not attack each other for the time being
column4: allowing us to focus our power to the other borders.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_200002845;University of Munster Founded;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_200002845;A new high level education facility
column2: the University of Munster has been established
column3: allowing some of our students to turn their interest to science
column4: and granting us a greater scientific output.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000285;Patent of Tolerance;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000285;A new patent
column2: the Patent of Tolerance has been enacted in our country
column3: allowing the freedom of worship to our minorities. This will make most of the people happy
column4: but surely there will be some who opposes the idea of allowing other religions to have the same rights as they do.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000286;Bank of North America;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000286;The first bank has opened in our country
column2: and in the Americas
column3: allowing us to have the monopoly of money trade and lending business in the New World.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000287;Siku Quanshu Complete;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000287;A collection of books
column2: a complete encyclopedia of the era has been published by 361 scholars on the order of Emperor Qianlong
column3: to surpass what the Ming dynasty achieved in the past. It contained over 3400 titles
column4: in 36381 columes with more than 79000 chapters
column5: 2.3 million pages and 800 million Chinese characters.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000288;Volcano Laku Erupts;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000288;The volcano of Laki has erupted killing a large portion of the population of Iceland by the hot ash
column2: the falling rocks and the molten rock that destroyed everything in its way.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000289;Great Meteor Passes;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000289;Our nation is the first to sight the great meteor that passed near our planet today. In the past people may have thought that events like this bring bad luck
column2: but luckily we live in enlightened times.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000291;Hungarian Constitution Suspended;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000291;The current king has suspended the long standing Hungarian constitution
column2: angering the nobles
column3: proclaiming absolute rulership as many European rulers do in these years
column4: some people call the current period as the era of enlightened absolutism.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000292;With the bad crops of the recent years and the drought of this year our people are suffering
column2: trying to survive from day to day with what little food they have. News of cannibalism has reached the palace
column3: and even the leading nobles of our country fear what's coming next.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000293;Marriage of Figaro Debuts;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000293;A new opera of the talent
column2: Mozart debuts today in the city of Vienna in the royal opera house. We look forward to this event
column3: as the said composer has never ever disappointed us before.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000294;Earthquake in Chengdu province!;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000294;An earthquake has shaken the county this morning
column2: leading to many landslides.Countless people died
column3: and we are still searching the remote farms
column4: villages for survivors. Some of them were completely cut off
column5: so we still can't be sure about the complete damage done.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000295;Mont Blanc's Peak Reached;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000295;A citizen of our country has finally did what many tried before him and reached the peak of the highest mountain of Europe
column2: the Mont Blanc. This is a glorious day for our nation.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000296;The London Monster Arrested;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000296;A serial killer who has been on the streets for a long time has finally been arrested. The murderer
column2: who the population calls the London Monster has killed over 30 people
column3: but now he shall face justice and recieve a punishment worthy of such act.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000297;Semaphore Machine Invented;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000297;A new machine
column2: called semaphore has been finished by Claude Chappe and his brother. It was previously created by Englishmen
column3: but they never perfected it. Now
column4: with a royal support he started to cover all of France with semaphore lines
column5: allowing way faster communcation than ever before.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000298;Brandenburg Gate Complete;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000298;The Brandenburg Gate
column2: a huge monument to the glory of our nation has been finished. It is based on the ancient Roman archs of glory
column3: yet it is larger than most of them. It has quickly became the most well-known landmark of our nation.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000299;Ship Spotted on our Coasts;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000299;Another ship has arrived to our shores
column2: yet this one was different than those from Europe. It carried a flag we've never seen before and they arrived from the east
column3: from the newly found continent of the Europeans. They offered us help and brough gifts along to help our advancement and to work together for a brighter future.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000300;Unzen Volcano Erupts;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000300;Mount Unzen has erupted
column2: surprising the local population and killing many of them who could not get to safety in time. We can only hope that it will remain dormant after this disastrous eruption.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000301;Slavery Outlawed;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000301;With the latest reform of our king we have completely outlawed slavery between our borders
column2: being the first ones to do so in the world. We have become an example many shall follow
column3: that is for sure.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000302;Niccolo Paganini Debuts;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000302;Niccolo Paganini
column2: a violinist
column3: violist
column4: guitarist and composer has debuted today. He seemed really skilled
column5: some have already predicted that he will become the greatest virtuoso of our generation.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000303;Gott Erhalte Franz Den Kaiser;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000303;Gott Erhalte Franz Den Kaiser or Kaiserhymne has been composed by Joseph Haydn and a lyrics was created by Lorenz Leopold Haschka as an anthem to Francis II
column2: Emperor of The Holy Roman Empire and Austria
column3: but after its success the emperor chose it to be the national song of the Habsburg Empire.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000304;Act of Union;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000304;The Act of Union has been passed to unite the Kingdom of Great Britain and the Kingdom of Ireland into one crown and completely one country
column2: with one government
column3: one Upper house and the same laws.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000305;First Census of the UK;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000305;We have carried out the first complete census in the history of our country
column2: gathering information about the population
column3: the cities
column4: villages and the overall demography of our country.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000306;First Census in France;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000306;We have carried out the first complete census in the history of our country
column2: gathering information about the population
column3: the cities
column4: villages and the overall demography of our country.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000307;Composed Upon Westminster Bridge;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000307;William Wordsworth
column2: one of the first English Romantic poets created a sonet
column3: titled Composed upon Westminster Bridge
column4: describing the city of London
column5: the River Thames and the view from Westminster Bridge in the early morning.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000308;Haiti Proclaims Independence!;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000308;The state of Haiti
column2: on the western portion of Hispaniola his declared independence
column3: forming their own government. This was mostly carried out by the slave population
column4: who took rose up and took control of our local administration.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000309;Ethnic Cleansing;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000309;We have been enslaved for too long
column2: living in fear of our master's sometimes outrageous commands. But now we are the masters. We shall carry out our revenge
column3: killing each and every white person on our free island. Long live the revolution!;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000310;First Serbian Uprising;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000310;The unrest between our Serb population has been growing
column2: but now it slowly turns into an open rebellion. The nationalist ideas that started growing in them is nothing
column3: but bad news for us. We must prepare to put them down
column4: by force.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000311;Serdom Abolished;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000311;The serfdom has finally been abolished between abolished
column2: freeing the serfs
column3: letting them keep their lands as free subjects. We are a living example for the rest of Europe!;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000312;Academy of Fine Arts Founded;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000312;An academy has opened in M?nich with classes for fine arts
column2: sculpture
column3: visual arts
column4: painting
column5: artistic concepts
column6: art education
column7: gold- and silversmithing
column8: as well as graphic design
column9: the professors and students carry out candid discussions. The master courses of Architecture and Urban Studies as well as Art and Public Space are among the most renowned in their fields.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000313;Addresses to the German Nation;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000313;A political book has been published by German philosopher Johann Gottlieb Dichte that advocates German nationalism. Evoking a sense of German distinctiveness in language
column2: tradition and literature that composed a common identity.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000314;Finland Separates!;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000314;Finland
column2: which belonged to us for many years have separated
column3: and we could not do anything against it
column4: since the Russians automaticly proclaimed their support for the Finnish freedom
column5: basicly establishing a protectorate.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000315;Bolivia Declares Independence;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000315;Bolivia
column2: one of our western colonies in South America has declared independence under a militaristic junta. Our current economical state may or may not allow us to retake it
column3: but we must try.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000316;Ecuador declares independence!;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000316;Ecuador
column2: one of our smaller colonies declared independence in South America as a free democracy
column3: capturing our local administrative buildings. We have to try and retake them before others follow.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000317;Royal Opera House Opens;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000317;The Royal Opera House has been opened at the site of the original opera house of 1732
column2: which was burnt down later. It became the home of the Royal Opera
column3: the Royal Ballet and the Orchestra of the Royal Opera House.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000318;Venezuela Declares Independence!;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000318;The people of Venezuela had enough of our leadership and chose to declare independence with a military junta to lead the country. We must retake them
column2: before we completely lose our control over South America!;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000319;Fur Elise Composed;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000319;Ludwig van Beethoven
column2: a great composer in our service has composed his so far most popular composition for solo piano
column3: titled For Elise.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000320;Mexico Declares Independence;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000320;The people of Mexico
column2: including the Central American provinces have declared independence from our rule
column3: creating their own government. We must try and retake the provinces
column4: before they can get more colonies to join their cause.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000321;Chile Forms a Junta;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000321;We recieved news that the people in Chile have created a military junta. They did not try to declare their independence yet
column2: but they might do any time now. We should station more soldiers there to contain them.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000322;The First Oktoberfest;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000322;During a recen royal marriage celebration every citizen of Munich were invited to attend the festivities held before the city gates. This event was called Theresienwiese
column2: in honor of the Crown Princess. This event was so popular that it was decided to be held every year at the same time.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000323;Buenos Aires Riots;;;;;;x;;

desc_ev_20000323;Unrest grows in the city of Buenos Aires following the recent revolutions in the other Spanish colonies. We can only hope that these mostly peaceful riots won't turn into another open rebellion.;;;;;;x;;
ev_20000324;Paraguay Declares Independence;;;;;;x;;

desc_ev_20000324;The state of Paraguay in the middle of South America has declared independence following the examples of the other nearby colonies. To remain true to the crown we must try to fight and take them back.;;;;;;x;;
ev_20000326;Miguel Hidalgo y Costilla Executed;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000326;A Jesuit-trained Mexican priest
column2: leader of the Mexican Independence Movement has been caught in a trap of ours
column3: his regiment killed
column4: and now on this very day he was executed by a firing squad.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000327;Freedom of Expression in Argentina!;;;;;;x;;

desc_ev_20000327;The new government of Argentina has declared complete freedom of expression. This almost automaticly led to thousands of anti-Spanish and revolutionary articles to flood the local presses.;;;;;;x;;
ev_20000328;Luddite Attacks;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000328;The luddites
column2: a movement who vowed to destroy every machine that takes away people's jobs has attacked a wool processing factory in West Yorkshire to start fulfilling their promise. We really should consider creating more factories for the people who became unemployed because of the automatization.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000329;Caracas Destroyed!;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000329;The city of Caracas has been destroyed by a recent earthquake
column2: leaving almost no building standing. Many people died
column3: but the casulties were way lower than the damage caused to the city itself.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000330;Pride and Prejudice Published;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000330;Jean Austen
column2: a female author has published a new book
column3: that immediatly became best seller. It is a novel of manners
column4: morality in the society of the landed gentry of the present day's England.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000331;Argentina Declares Independence;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000331;Argentina
column2: with its newly formed government has declared independence aswell
column3: following the events of the riots in Buenos Aires. We shall do everything to reclaim our lands
column4: while we still can.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000332;The Kalmar Union Ends;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000332;The Kalmar Union has ended after many years of its existence. Norwey was released as a separate
column2: independent nation
column3: which lasted only for a few days
column4: as soon Sweden invaded
column5: vassalizing the country.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000334;Second Serbian Uprising;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000334;The Serbian unrest has grown again
column2: following the other revolutions in the world. We watch as the firstly peaceful riots turn into a bloody conflict. The only thing we can do to keep these lands is to establish a free state
column3: belonging to us to calm the Serb mob.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000335;Chile Proclaims Independence;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000335;After its junta being formed Chile has also declared its own government
column2: leaving Spanish rule. We may try to retake these colonies aswell
column3: but surely the local unrest would be even higher afterwards.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000336;We have finally adopted a flag to represent our country. With thirteen stripes and stars equal to the amount of states belonging to us. Our people shall be proud of this new national symbol.;;;;;;x;;
ev_20000337;Gran Colombia Formed;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000337;Sim?n Bolivar
column2: the leading revolutionary who helped many nation to freedom has created the nation of Gran Colombia uniting the newly freed Colombia with our nation of Venezuela. Spain won't be able to stop us.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000338;Florida Sold;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000338;With our colonies abandoning us we could only try and protect what little we have. The riots in Florida have been beaten down for now
column2: but we can never be sure
column3: so we chose to sell it instead to the USA in return of not attacking our holdings in Texas.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000339;Burlington Arcade Opens;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000339;A new shopping lane
column2: the Burlington Arcade has opened in London visited by mostly the royal members and the nobility
column3: allowing them to forget their everyday problems and focus on buying new things of their taste.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000340;Venus de Milo Discovered;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000340;An ancient statue has been discovered on the isle of Milos of the ancient greek godess
column2: Venus. It shall be put on display once it was closely inspected by our scientists and historians.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000341;Greek War of Independence;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000341;With the growing nationalism in the world the greeks have also formed their own movement
column2: declaring independence from our authority and gathering their citizens in order to fight our armies back. Our reconquest shall be swift.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000342;Peru Declares Independence;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000342;The colony of Peru has declared independence from our nation
column2: overthrowing the local governor and forming their own government. We shall try to retake them by force
column3: but our holdings in the Americas are shrinking rapidly.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000343;Central American States Gain Local Authority;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000343;The mini states of Central America have been granted with local authority in order to keep them with us for now.;;;;;;x;;
ev_20000344;Panama Declares Independence;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000344;The colony of Panama has declared independence
column2: but instead of forming a local government they chose to join the existing Gran Colombian Union in order to protect themself better
column3: which they might not be able to do themselves.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000345;Dominican Republic Declares Independence;;;;;;x;;

desc_ev_20000345;The Dominican Republic has declared independence in the eastern part of Hispaniola. With our colonies shrinking rapidly we still should be able to retake them to keep a footholding in South America.;;;;;;x;;
ev_20000346;Dominican Republic Invaded;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000346;With the neighbouring Spanish colony rebelling this is the best possible time for us to gain some more land
column2: and the total control of Hispaniola. It should be easy to take them over
column3: since they are still not that well organized
column4: and the Spanish forces are still far away.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000347;Brazil Declares Independence;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000347;With the growing nationalism in the Americas our colony of Brazil has also declared its independence from us with the leadership of a self-proclaimed emperor
column2: Peter I. We should try our best and retake what is de jure ours.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000349;Empire Ends;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000349;With the death of our emperor who didn't appoint a heir we can only do one thing to avoid falling into an inner conflict
column2: we shall declare a democracy with strong centralized
column3: presdential leadership.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000350;Central America Declares Independence;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000350;The United States of Central America
column2: a coalition of the Central American mini states have declared their own government and independence from us and any other power. As we previously already given them the possibility of local authority we do not wish to start a war for those mostly useless lands.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000351;Bolivar Proclaimed Dictator;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000351;Bolivar
column2: the liberator of most South American nations has been proclaimed the dictator of our country
column3: to lead it to a better future. He was relunctant at first
column4: but he accepted it after all to the joy of our people.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000352;New Holland Renamed;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000352;With the continent of New Holland mostly under our supervision we chose to follow an older plan to rename the continent into something more distinctive
column2: Australia.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000353;Uruguay Secedes;;;;;;x;;

desc_ev_20000353;The people of Uruguay have chosen to secede from our nation and try to take part in the world politics on their own. Of course we do not wish to go into war so early in our free nations history
column2: so we decided to let them go freely
column3: for now.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000355;First Railway Opens;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000355;After the perfection of the steam engine and the creation of steel that could support the weight of a so called locomotive
column2: a cart moved by a steam engine on set steel tracks we could succesfully create the very first public
column3: mainly freight railroad in the history
column4: connecting Colliery to a river port.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000357;Menai Suspension Bridge Complete;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000357;A bridge connecting the island of Anglesey and Wales has been needed for a long time
column2: but since this location was heavy with sea traffic we could not construct a bridge until now
column3: with the invention of suspension bridges
column4: from which one of the first ones has been built here.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000358;Shikshapatri Written by Swaminarayan;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000358;The Shikshapatri
column2: a religious text of two hundred and twelve verses has been completed in Sanskrit by Bhangwan Swaminarayan
column3: that is considered to be a key scripture of the mentioned holy man's followers and the basis of the sect. It is a detailed text about the ways of living a spiritually uplifting life.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000359;New Drilling Methods;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000359;Following our empire's loss of power the sultan of our nation decided to reform our most elite unit
column2: the Janissaries in a Western European manner. This allowed us to regain some of our lost respect and fear from the bordering nations.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000360;Cisplatine War;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000360;After being released peacefully by Brazil they went against their promise and attacked us. Luckily the neighbouring country of Argentina has came to our aid
column2: starting the so called Cisplatinate War.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000361;Fountain Pen invented;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000361;A new tool to make writing easier
column2: the fountain pen has been invented by a Romanian inventor
column3: called Petrarche Poenaru. Of course this new invention was instantly given royal patent and was started to be mass produced by factories and applied to administrative useage.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000362;Great Fire of Turku;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000362;The city of Turku has been completely destroyed
column2: killing a large portion of the local residents by a fire unlike any before. We could do nothing as it spread to every district
column3: nothing could stop it at all. May God have mercy on the victims' souls.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000363;Typhoon Strikes Japan;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000363;A larger typhoon has reached our shores today
column2: killing many people and destroying farms and houses aswell. Luckily it was a mostly rural place
column3: but the damage is still very high.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000364;Greece Granted Autonomy;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000364;Following the unsuccesful war for freedom
column2: under the pressure of the European nation we had no choice but to give Greece local autonomy and a separate government
column3: while still holding them as a vassal.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000365;Webster-Hayne Debate;;;;;;x;;

desc_ev_20000365;"A debate took place today between Senator Daniel Webster of Massachusetts and Senator Robert Y. Hayne of South Carolina on the topic of protectionist tariffs. The heated speeches between Webster and Hayne themselves were unplanned
column2: and stemmed from debate over a resolution by Connecticut Senator Samuel A. Foot calling for the temporary suspension of further land surveying until land already on the market was sold (this would effectively stop the introduction of new lands onto the market). Webster's ""Second Reply to Hayne"" was generally regarded as ""the most eloquent speech ever delivered in Congress."" ";;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000366;Ecuador Separates;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000366;While our coalition has served its pupose to keep Spain from regaining its territories from us
column2: the people of Ecuador chose not to continue its membership in it. It could be because of any reasons
column3: but we must accept their decision and let them go as a free state.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000367;First Constitution;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000367;Now
column2: that we succesfully separated from Spain we can concentrate on stabilizing the country
column3: and the first step towards it shall be to create our first constitution based on the modern European thoughts
column4: creating a free democracy.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000368;Foreign Legion Founded;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000368;With our armies mostly tied down in Europe we have lesser power to project to our colonies leading to unrest
column2: as they try following the way of the Spanish colonies. But we'll have none from that
column3: so we set up a new army
column4: the Foreign Legion to be recruited from any non-French citizen
column5: trained and sent off to our colonies to keep up the peace.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000369;Bosnian Rebellion;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000369;The Bosnians
column2: following the new nationalistic thoughts have risen up like the Serbians and the Greeks before to gain their independence
column3: of course this is against our interests so we must reclaim our lands before some Western power chose to support their cause.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000370;Cholera Outbreak in London;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000370;A disease called cholera has started spreading in the city of London killing many people
column2: but luckily nowhere near what the plague did
column3: thanks to the modern medications and the somewhat better standard of living.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000371;Vom Kriege Published;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000371;Carl von Clausewitz
column2: a strategist and soldier of our nation has written a book regarding militar tactics that has been published now
column3: after his death. It is called Vom Kriege and it shall become a standard in the officer schools.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000372;Slavery Abolished;;;;;;x;;

desc_ev_20000372;Following the ideals of freedom we have completely abolished slavery and freeing every slave between our borders. From now on we will be able to force our views on other nations who are still stuck with the old ways of slavery.;;;;;;x;;
ev_20000373;Zollverein;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000373;A tariff-free union has been created between the cultural borders of Germany by us
column2: allowing our influence to spread to the german-speaking states
column3: getting closer to a united german state.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000374;Spanish Inquisition Ended;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000374;The era of the inquisitions have ended with the beginning of a new
column2: greater era. We no longer have the need or support the idea of forcing religious teachings on someone.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000375;Romanian Language Banned;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000375;The Romanian language has been banned in the administration and the teaching system of the occupied part of Romania by us
column2: to stop
column3: or at least slow down the separatist tendencies.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000376;Mexican Academy of Languages Founded;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000376;The first higher level facility in the free state of Mexico has been founded
column2: the Academy of Languages. This shall allow us to reach out scientific goals a bit quicker.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000377;Railway in Brussels;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000377;After the first well-working public railroad has been opened in the United Kingdom we chose to follow them by opening a railroad in the area of the city of Brussels.;;;;;;x;;
ev_20000378;First German Railroad;;;;;;x;;

desc_ev_20000378;After the initial railroads being built in England and the Low Countries the first railroad has been opened around the area of the city of Nuremberg with the help of English engineers.;;;;;;x;;
ev_20000379;Texas Declares Independence;;;;;;x;;

desc_ev_20000379;After all of our South American colonies have declared their independence we thought that the rebellions have passed for good. But apparently not as the state of Texas has also declared independence
column2: seeking aid from the other
column3: succesfully separated states. We shall try everything to retake it.;;;;;;x;;

desc_ev_20000380;Chesapeake-Leopard Affair;;;;;;x;;
ev_20000381;Little Belt Affair;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000381;Little Belt Affair;;;;;;x;;

EVTDESC111011928;Through warfare and diplomacy an Arabian union has been created. Shall we join it?;Grâce aux armes et à la diplomatie

expand_motala_verkstad_title;Motala Verkstad;Motala Verkstad;Motala Verkstad;;Motala Verkstad;;;;;;;;;x

expand_motala_verkstad_desc;Motala Verkstad' (Motala work- or machineshop) was founded in 1822 by Baltazar von Platen during the building of the Göta Canal. During the foremanship of Otto Edvard Carlsund
column2: from 1843 to 1870
column3: Motala Verkstad became one of Sweden's most internationally renowned manufacturies. The Workshop is mentioned in Jules Verne's novel '20.000 Leagues under the Sea' as having produced parts for the novel's fictional 'Nautilus' submarine.;"Le « Motala Verkstad » (ateliers de machines) fut fondé en 1822 par Baltazar von Platen lors de la construction du canal de Göta. Sous la direction d’Otto Edvard Carlsund
column4: entre 1843 et 1870
column5: Motala Verkstad devint une des manufactures suédoises les plus réputées. L’atelier est mentionné dans le roman de Jules Verne
column6: ""20 000 lieues sous les mers""
column7: comme un des fournisseurs de pièces pour le Nautilus.";Motala Verkstad' (Motala Werk- oder Maschinenwerkstatt) wurde 1822 während des Baus des Göta-Kanals durch Baltazar von Platen gegründet. Während der Führung Otto Edvard Carlsunds von 1843 bis 1870 wurde Motala Verkstad zu einer der international bekanntesten schwedischen Fabriken. Sie wird sogar in Jules Vernes' Roman '20.000 Meilen unter dem Meer' als Teilehersteller für das fiktionale U-Boot 'Nautilus' erwähnt.;;Motala Verkstad (taller o fábrica Motala) fue fundada en 1822 por Baltazar von Platen durante la construcción del canal de Göta. Bajo la dirección técnica de Otto Edvard Carlsund
column9: Motala Verkstad se convirtió en uno de los fabricantes suecos más conocidos en el mundo. Julio Verne lo menciona en su novela '20.000 leguas de viaje submarino' como constructora de parte de su ficticio submarino 'Nautilus'.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: extraterritoriality_granted;Extraterritoriality Granted;Extraterritorialité accordée;Extraterritorialität gewährt;;Extraterritorialidad concedida;;;;;;;;;x;;;;

desc_extraterritoriality_granted;Our country has granted extraterritoriality to citizens of the Great Powers.;Notre pays a accordé l'extraterritorialité aux citoyens des Grandes Puissances.;Unser Land hat Bürgern der Großmächte Extraterritorialität gewährt.;;Nuestro país ha concedido la extraterritorialidad a los ciudadanos de las grandes potencias.;;;;;;;;;x;;;;

fallout_desc;The devastation brought upon us by our enemy's nuclear strike threatens to spread should the wind turn in this foul miasma's favour.;;;;;;x;;

fatherland_volunteers_title;Fatherland Volunteers;Les volontaires de la patrie;Vaterländische Freiwillige;;Voluntarios por la patria;;;;;;;;;x
fatherland_volunteers_desc;During The War of The Triple Alliance
column2: when Paraguayan troops invaded the Brazilian province of Mato Grosso
column3: Pedro II
column4: the Brazilian Emperor
column5: angered by what he saw as incompetence on part of the Brazilian military
column6: demanded that he himself be allowed to go in person to the front. When both the Cabinet and the National Assembly refused his wish
column7: Pedro threatened to abdicate the imperial throne and join the army as a volunteer
column8: reportedly saying that 'If they can prevent me from going as an Emperor
column9: they cannot prevent me from abdicating and going as a Fatherland Volunteer'. Naturally
column10: the Cabinet was left without much choice. Brazilians who later volunteered during the war were called 'Fatherland Volunteers'
column11: in memory of Pedro's quote. Say it like Pedro did
column12: and the nation will follow wherever you lead.;Lors de la guerre de la Triple alliance
column13: lorsque les troupes paraguayennes envahirent la province brésilienne de Mato Grosso
column14: Pierre II
column15: l'empereur du Brésil
column16: se mit en colère contre ce qu'il qualifiait d'incompétence de la part de l'armée brésilienne et demanda l'autorisation de rejoindre personnellement le front. Face au refus du cabinet et de l'assemblée nationale d'accéder à sa demande
column17: Pierre II menaça d'abdiquer pour rejoindre l'armée en tant que volontaire et il tint les propos suivants : "S'ils peuvent m'empêcher d'être empereur
column18: ils ne peuvent m'empêcher d'abdiquer et de rejoindre les volontaires de la patrie". Naturellement
column19: le cabinet n'eut guère le choix. Les Brésiliens qui lui emboîtèrent le pas étaient appelés "volontaires de la patrie" en mémoire de ses propos. Reprenez les propos de Pierre II et la nation sera derrière vous.;Während des Tripel-Allianz-Kriegs
column20: als paraguanische Truppen in die brasilianische Provinz Mato Grosso
column21: ärgerte sich Peter II.
column22: der brasilianische Kaiser
column23: um die vermeintliche Inkompetenz des brasilianischen Militärs
column24: und verlangte
column25: selbst an die Front gehen zu dürfen. Also sowohl das Kabinett als auch die Nationalversammlung seinen Wunsch ablehnte
column26: drohte Peter II. damit
column27: abzudanken und als Freiwilliger in die Armee einzutreten. Er soll gesagt haben: 'Wenn sie mich daran hindern können
column28: als Kaiser zu gehen
column29: dann können sie mich nicht daran hindern
column30: abzudanken und als vaterländischer Freiwilliger zu gehen'. Das Kabinett hatte nun natürlich kaum noch eine Wahl. Brasilianische Freiwillige wurden später in Erinnerung an Peters Zitat 'vaterländische Freiwillige' genannt. Sagen Sie es wie Peter II.
column31: und die Nation wird Ihnen bedingungslos folgen.;;Durante la Guerra de la Triple Alianza
column32: cuando las tropas paraguayas invadieron la provincia brasileña del Mato Grosso
column33: Pedro II
column34: el emperador de Brasil
column35: enfurecido por lo que consideró una muestra de incompetencia por parte de las fuerzas armadas de su país
column36: solicitó permiso para acudir en persona al frente. Cuando el Gabinete y la Asamblea Nacional rechazaron su solicitud
column37: Pedro amenazó con abdicar del trono imperial y alistarse en el ejército como voluntario
column38: alegando que 'Aunque pueden evitar que vaya como Emperador
column39: no puede evitar que abdique y marche como voluntario por la patria.' Naturalmente
column40: al Gabinete no le quedaron muchas opciones. Los brasileños que se alistaron posteriormente recibieron el nombre de 'voluntarios por la patria' en memoria de la cita del Emperador. Dilo
column41: como lo dijo Pedro
column42: y la nación te seguirá a donde quiera que la guíes.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: female_suffrage;Woman's Suffrage;Droit de vote des femmes;Frauenwahlrecht;;Sufragismo;;;;;;;;;x
female_suffrage_desc;Our country accords women legal equality with men
column2: and the right to vote in general elections.;Notre pays accorde aux femmes la même égalité qu'aux hommes ainsi que le droit de voter lors des élections générales.;Unser Land gewährt Frauen denselben Rechtsstatus wie Männern sowie das Wahlrecht für Parlamentswahlen.;;Nuestro país acuerda la igualdad legal entre mujeres y hombres
column3: y el derecho a votar en las elecciones generales.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Five_Year_Plan_title;Five Year Plan;;;;;;x;;
Five_Year_Plan_desc;A Five Year Plan has been issued to help economic growth.;;;;;;x;;
flying_university;Flying University;L'université volante;Fliegende Universität;;Universidad flotante;;;;;;;;;x;;;;

desc_flying_university;An underground organisation provides higher education in a minority language;Une organisation clandestine permet de faire des études dans une langue minoritaire.;Eine Untergrundorganisation bietet höhere Bildung in einer Minderheitensprache an.;;Una organización clandestina proporciona enseñanza superior en el lenguaje de una minoría.;;;;;;;;;x;;;;
folkis_educates;Folkskolan;La Folkskolan;Folkskolan;;Folkskolan;;;;;;;;;x

folkis_educates_desc;An efficient and modern compulsory school system is educating our youth in several basic subjects.;Un système scolaire efficace et moderne consiste à dispenser à nos jeunes différents enseignements de base.;Ein effizientes und verpflichtendes modernes Schulsystem
column2: das unsere Jugend in einigen Fächern unterrichtet.;;Un moderno y eficaz sistema escolar está educando a nuestros jóvenes en diversas materias básicas.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: forced_egyptological_excavations_title;The Valley of the Kings;La vallée des rois;Das Tal der Könige;;El Valle de los Reyes;;;;;;;;;x;;;;
forced_egyptological_excavations_desc;Since we control Luxor
column2: we can send an expedition to The Valley of The Kings to conduct archeological excavations. Discoveries of Egyptian tombs could increase our prestige.;À présent que nous contrôlons Louxor
column3: nous pouvons dépêcher une expédition dans la vallée des rois pour y conduire des fouilles archéologiques. La découverte de tombeaux égyptiens nous permettrait d'accroître notre prestige.;Da wir Luxor kontrollieren
column4: können wir eine Expedition ins Tal der Könige entsenden
column5: um archäologische Ausgrabungen durchzuführen. Entdeckungen ägyptischer Gräber könnten unser Prestige steigern.;;El control de Luxor nos permite enviar una expedición arqueológica al valle de los Reyes. El descubrimiento de las tumbas egipcias podría aumentar nuestro prestigio.;;;;;;;;;x;;;;

column1: foreign_smugglers;Foreign Smugglers;Contrebandiers étrangers;Ausländische Schmuggler;;Contrabandistas extranjeros;;;;;;;;;x;;;;

desc_foreign_smugglers;A smuggling ring run by foreigners operates in this province.;Un cercle de contrebandiers dirigé par des étrangers sévit dans cette province.;Ein von Ausländern geführter Schmugglerring arbeitet in dieser Provinz.;;En esta provincia opera una red de contrabando dirigida por extranjeros.;;;;;;;;;x;;;;
foreign_trading_post;Foreign Trading Post;Comptoir étranger;Ausländischer Handelsposten;;Puesto comercial extranjero;;;;;;;;;x;;;;
desc_foreign_trading_post;A separate class of our citizens
column2: kept apart from the general populace
column3: administer a trading post for foreigners in this province.;Une catégorie distincte de nos citoyens
column4: tenue à l'écart du reste de la population
column5: gère un comptoir réservé aux étrangers de cette province.;Eine separate Klasse unserer Bürger
column6: die von der allgemeinen Bevölkerung ferngehalten wird
column7: betreibt einen Handelsposten in dieser Provinz.;;Una clase separada de nuestros ciudadanos
column8: apartada del populacho general
column9: administra un puesto comercial para extranjeros en esta provincia.;;;;;;;;;x;;;;

column1: form_kellys_irish_brigade_title;Kelly's Irish Brigade;La brigade irlandaise de Kelly;Kelly's Irish Brigade;;Brigada Irlandesa de Kelly;;;;;;;;;x
form_kellys_irish_brigade_desc;Did those cowardly lincolnites tremble
column2: when they met with the Irish brigade?'\n\nWhile most Irish immigrants to the USA fought for the Union during the Civil War
column3: some decided instead to side with the Confederacy
column4: seeing
column5: perhaps
column6: the southern secession as running parallel to Ireland's own struggles to win independence from England.;Ces lâches lincolniens ont-ils tremblé lorsqu'ils se sont heurtés à la brigade irlandaise ?'\n\nAlors que la plupart des immigrés irlandais installés aux États-Unis combattirent pour l'Union lors de la guerre de Sécession
column7: certains choisirent de rejoindre la Confédération après avoir
column8: peut-être
column9: assimilé la sécession du sud avec les propres luttes d'indépendance de l'Irlande.;Haben diese feigen Lincoln-Anhänger gezittert
column10: als sie es mit der Irish Brigade zu tun bekamen?'\n\nWährend sich die meisten irischen Einwander in den USA den Unionstruppen anschlossen
column11: entschlossen sich einige
column12: stattdessen für die Konföderation zu kämpfen. Vielleicht sahen sie in der Abspaltung des Südens den gleichen Kampf um Unabhängigkeit wie den Irlands gegen England.;;¿Temblaron esos cobardes partidarios de Lincoln al encontrarse con la Brigada Irlandesa?\n\nAunque la mayoría de los inmigrantes irlandeses en los Estados Unidos de América lucharon para la Unión en la Guerra Civil
column13: algunos decidieron combatir en el bando confederado al ver
column14: quizás
column15: en la Secesión
column16: un paralelismo con las propias luchas de Irlanda para obtener la independencia de Gran Bretaña.;;;;;;;;;x

found_quebec_title;Habitation de Québec;;;;;;x;;

found_quebec_desc;Samuel de Champlain has recently returned from an expedition to the land they call Quebec. He has since then asked the French government to support a new expedition with the goal of establishing a permanent settlement at the mouth of the St. Lawrence river.;;;;;;x;;
found_the_bbc_title;Found The BBC;Fondation de la BBC;BBC gründen;;Fundar la BBC;;;;;;;;;x
found_the_bbc_desc;"The British Broadcasting Corporation
column2: Britain's public service radio and
column3: eventually
column4: television network
column5: was founded on 18 October 1922 as the 'British Broadcasting Company Ltd'. The company was originally founded by a group of six telecommunications companies
column6: and the first transmission was sent from 2LO station
column7: London
column8: on November 14 1922. Form the BBC
column9: and let ""Nation Speak Peace Unto Nation"".";La British Broadcasting Corporation
column10: la radio publique britannique
column11: puis ensuite le réseau de télévision
column12: fut fondée le 18 octobre 1922 sous le nom de "British Broadcasting Company Ltd". À l'origine
column13: cette compagnie regroupait six sociétés de télécommunication et la première transmission fut lancée depuis la station 2LO de Londres le 14 novembre 1922. Fondez la BBC et puisse la nation dire la paix à la nation.;"Die British Broadcasting Corporation
column14: Englands öffentlich-rechtlicher Hörfundsender und schließlich auch TV-Anstalt

french_military_mission_to_japan_title;Chanoine's Expedition;L'expédition de Chanoine;Chanoines Expedition;;La expedición de Chanoine;;;;;;;;;x
french_military_mission_to_japan_desc;In 1867
column2: at the behest of the Japanese Shogunate at Edo
column3: France sent a military mission to Japan to help train Shogunate troops in the arts of western warfare. The mission was led by
column4: then Captain
column5: Charles Chanoine
column6: who would later go on to become France's Minister of War during the Brisson government of 1898. Send a military mission to Japan
column7: and our relations with them are sure to improve.;En 1867
column8: sur l'ordre du shogun japonais d'Edo
column9: la France envoya une mission militaire au Japon pour former les troupes du shogun aux arts de la guerre occidentale. La mission était commandée par Charles Chanoine
column10: alors capitaine
column11: qui deviendrait plus tard ministre de la Guerre du cabinet Brisson de 1898. Dépêchez une mission militaire au Japon et nos relations avec ce pays s'amélioreront.;Im Jahr 1867 entsandte Frankreich auf Anweisung des japanischen Shogunats in Edo eine Militärmission nach Japan
column12: um die Truppen des Shogunats in westlicher Kriegsführung zu unterweisen. Die Mission stand unter dem Kommando des damaligen Hauptmanns Charles Chanoine
column13: der später im Jahr 1898 während der Amtszeit Henri Brissons bis zum Kriegsminister Frankreichs aufstieg. Wenn wir eine Militärmission nach Japan entsenden
column14: werden sich unsere Beziehungen zu ihnen mit Sicherheit verbessern.;;En 1867
column15: a petición del shogunato japonés de Edo
column16: Francia envió una misión militar a Japón para ayudar a entrenar a sus tropas en las artes de la guerra occidental. La misión fue dirigida por el entonces capitán Charles Chanoine
column17: que luego sería el ministro de guerra francés durante el gobierno de Brisson en 1898. Enviemos una misión militar a Japón y nuestras relaciones con ellos seguro que mejorarán.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: french_second_empire1_title;The Second Empire;;;;;;x;;

french_second_empire1_desc;"After Napoleon III's coup he reformed the government into the shape of Napoleon I's French Empire. Although the machinery of government was almost the same under the Second Empire as it had been under the First
column2: its founding principles were different. The function of the Empire
column3: as Emperor Napoleon III often repeated
column4: was to guide the people internally towards justice and externally towards perpetual peace. Holding his power by universal male suffrage
column5: and having frequently
column6: from his prison or in exile
column7: reproached previous oligarchical governments with neglecting social questions
column8: he set out to solve them by organising a system of government based on the principles of the ""Napoleonic Idea""
column9: i.e. of the emperor
column10: the elect of the people as the representative of the democracy
column11: and as such supreme; and of himself
column12: the representative of the great Napoleon I of France
column13: ""who had sprung armed from the French Revolution like Minerva from the head of Jove""
column14: as the guardian of the social gains of the revolutionary period.";;;;;;x;;

column1: fugitive_slave_act_title;Fugitive Slave Act;"Acte ""esclave fugitif""";Fugitive Slave Act;;El Acta sobre esclavos fugitivos;;;;;;;;;x;;;;
fugitive_slave_act_desc;By introducing a Federal Fugitive Slave Act
column2: we can enforce the return of escaped slaves to their owners in the slave-states. Doing so will
column3: at least for some time
column4: calm southern fears of abolitionism.;Grâce à une loi fédérale
column5: nous pourrons statuer sur les modalités de capture des esclaves évadés et de leur retour à leur propriétaire dans les États esclavagistes. Cela devrait momentanément calmer les craintes d'abolitionnisme des Sudistes.;Durch die Verabschiedung eines bundesweiten Fugitive Slave Act können wir die Rückkehr entlaufener Sklaven zu ihren Besitzern in den Sklavenstaaten erzwingen. Dies wird zumindest eine Weile lang die Ängste des Südens vor dem Abolitionismus beschwichtigen.;;Con la aprobación del Acta federal sobre esclavos fugitivos impondremos por ley la devolución de los esclavos fugitivos a sus propietarios. De este modo aplacaremos
column6: al menos por algún tiempo
column7: los temores sureños sobre el abolicionismo.;;;;;;;;;x;;;;

column1: gag_rule_title;House Gag Rule;Règle du silence à la Chambre;Maulkorberlass;;Limitación de los poderes de la cámara;;;;;;;;;x;;;;
gag_rule_desc;The seemingly irresolvable debate over slavery threatens to tear our country apart. If we were to introduce a gag rule in the House of Representatives
column2: barring bills on the slavery issue from being presented to the House
column3: we could hope to at least alleviate some of the worst tensions;Le débat apparament insoluble sur l'esclavage menace de diviser notre pays. Si nous mettions en place une règle du silence à la Chambre des représentants
column4: afin d'empécher qu'un projet de loi sur l'esclavage soit soumis
column5: nous pourrions au moins espérer calmer les pires tensions.;Die anscheinend unlösbare Debatte über die Sklaverei droht unser Land zu zerreißen. Wenn wir einen Maulkorberlass im Repräsentantenhaus verfügen
column6: der verhindert
column7: dass Gesetzesvorlagen zur Sklaverei dem Haus unterbreitet werden
column8: haben wir wenigstens Hoffnung
column9: die schlimmsten Spannungen zu lindern;;El debate aparentemente irresoluble sobre la esclavitud amenaza con destruir nuestro país. Si limitamos la independencia de la cámara de representantes prohibiendo la presentación de proyectos de ley relativos a la esclavitud
column10: es posible que contribuyamos a aliviar la tensión.;;;;;;;;;x;;;;

column1: haussmanns_renovations_title;Haussmann's Renovations;Les rénovation du baron Haussmann;Haussmanns Renovierungen;;Las reformas de Haussmann;;;;;;;;;x
haussmanns_renovations_desc;The Haussmann Plan was a project for the modernization and urban renewal of Paris
column2: carried out between 1852 and 1870. The project was initiated after a period of rapid urban growth and development
column3: as the old city center of Paris had proven itself incapable of meeting the infrastructure demands of a growing city. The long
column4: open boulevards championed by Hausmann have remained defining characteristics of Paris' street layout ever since.;Le plan Haussmann est un projet pour la modernisation et le renouveau urbain de Paris
column5: qui fut mis en place de 1852 à 1870. Le projet fut décidé après une période de développement et de croissance urbaine rapide
column6: alors que le vieux centre de Paris se révélait de plus en plus inadapté aux exigences d’infrastructures d’une cité moderne. Les longs et larges boulevards défendus par Haussmann sont depuis lors une caractéristique du paysage urbain parisien.;Der Haussmann-Plan war ein Projekt zur Modernisierung und städtischen Erneuerung von Paris
column7: das zwischen 1852 und 1870 durchgeführt wurde. Das Projekt wurde nach einer starken Wachstums- und Entwicklungsperiode eingeleitet
column8: da das alte Stadtzentrum von Paris die Infrastrukturbedürfnisse einer wachsenden Stadt nicht länger erfüllen konnte. Die von Hausmann favorisierten Boulevards sind mit ihrer Länge und Breite seitdem die definierende Haupteigenschaft des Pariser Straßensystems.;;El Plan Haussmann fue un proyecto de renovación y modernización urbana de París
column9: llevado a cabo entre 1852 y 1870. El proyecto se inició tras un periodo de acelerado crecimiento urbano de la capital francesa
column10: en el que su centro antiguo se había revelado incapaz de hacer frente a las exigencias
column11: en términos de infraestructura
column12: de una ciudad en crecimiento. Desde entonces
column13: los largos y abiertos bulevares promovidos por Haussman se han convertido en una de las señas distintivas del trazado urbano de París.;;;;;;;;;x

hellenic_parliament_title;Voule ton Ellinon;Voulí ton Ellínon;Voule ton Ellinon;;Voule ton Ellinon;;;;;;;;;x
hellenic_parliament_desc;The first national parliament of the modern Greek state was instituted only in 1843
column2: and only after the September 3rd Revolution of that same year had effectively forced then King Otto to grant the country a constitution. The inauguration of the first 'Voule ton Ellinon'
column3: the Hellenic parliament
column4: marks not only Greece's transition to a constitutional monarchy
column5: but also the first taste of democracy in Hellas since the ancients.;Le premier parlement national de la Grèce moderne ne fut créé qu'en 1843 suite au coup d'État du 3 septembre qui contraignit le roi Othon Ier à accorder une constitution au pays. L'inauguration du premier "Voulí ton Ellínon"
column6: le Parlement hellénique
column7: marque non seulement la transition de la Grèce vers une monarchie constitutionnelle
column8: mais aussi ses premiers pas dans la démocratie d'Hellás depuis l'antiquité.;Das erste Nationalparlament des modernen griechischen Staats wurde erst im Jahr 1843 aufgestellt
column9: und König Otto gewährte dem Land erst nach der Revolution des dritten Septembers eine Verfassung. Die Einführung der ersten 'Voule ton Ellinon'
column10: dem hellenischen Parlament
column11: stand nicht nur für den Übergang Griechenlands zu einer konstitutionellen Monarchie
column12: sondern brachte den Griechen erstmals seit der Antike wieder einen Hauch von Demokratie.;;El primer parlamento nacional del estado griego moderno no fue instituido hasta1843
column13: solo después de que la revolución del 3 de septiembre del mismo año hubiese obligado al rey Otto a conceder una constitución al país. La inauguración del primer 'Voule ton Ellinon'
column14: el parlamento helénico
column15: no solo marca la transición de Grecia a una monarquía constitucional
column16: sino que aporta a la Hélade su primera democracia desde la Antigüedad.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: immoral_business;Immoral Business;Activité immorale;Unmoralische Geschäfte;;Negocios inmorales;;;;;;;;;x;;;;
desc_immoral_business;With rising crime rates and less government control
column2: businessmen would become more and more centered on their own profits. This results in a higher risk of collapse for the entire system
column3: as everybody strives for personal interests.;Avec la hausse du taux de criminalité et moins de contrôle du gouvernement
column4: les hommes d'affaires seraient de plus en plus centrés sur leurs propres bénéfices. Il en résulte un risque accru d'effondrement de l'ensemble du système
column5: comme tout le monde s'affaire pour ses intérêts personnels.;Mit steigenden Kriminalitätsraten und weniger Regierungskontrolle werden sich Geschäftsleute vermehrt auf ihre eigenen Profite konzentrieren. Dies führt zu einem höheren Zusammenbruchsrisiko für das gesamte System
column6: da jeder seinen persönlichen Interessen nachgeht.;;Con el aumento de la tasa de criminalidad y el menor control gubernamental
column7: los hombres de negocios se centraron más y más en su propio lucro. Esto comporta un gran riesgo de colapso de todo el sistema
column8: ya que todo el mundo lucha sólo por su interés personal.;;;;;;;;;x;;;;

institute_central_bank_title;National Banking Act;Loi bancaire nationale;Nationales Bankengesetz;;Ley de Banca Nacional;;;;;;;;;x
institute_central_bank_desc;While our government has for some time maintained a central bank
column2: some voices within the economic debate have begun arguing in favor of monopolizing the issuing of currency to a strict government prerogative. Proponents argue that this will lead to an increase in economic stability
column3: while opponents see it as a fundamental breach of the freedom of trade.;Alors que notre gouvernement maintient depuis un certain temps une banque centrale
column4: certaines voix s'élèvent en faveur de la monopolisation d'émission de devises selon une stricte prérogative gouvernementale. Les partisans soulignent le fait que cela renforcera la stabilité économique et les opposants y voient une violation fondamentale en termes de liberté des échanges.;Obwohl unsere Regierung bereits seit einiger Zeit eine Zentralbank unterhält
column5: befürworten einige Wirtschaftsexperten nun
column6: das Notenprivileg auf den Staat zu monopolisieren. Sie behaupten
column7: dies würde zur Stabilisierung der Wirtschaft beitragen
column8: werden die Gegner dieses Vorschlags ihn als fundamentalen Bruch der Handelsfreiheit ansehen.;;Como nuestro gobierno ha mantenido durante algún tiempo un banco central
column9: algunas voces del debate económico han empezado a discutir a favor de monopolizar el asunto de la moneda como una prerrogativa estricta del gobierno. Los defensores sostienen que esto llevará a un aumento de la estabilidad económica
column10: mientras que los oponentes lo consideran una brecha fundamental de la libertad de comercio.;;;;;;;;;x

international_apology_desc;We believe that it  is time to declare that we renounce our previous aggressive behaviour and are now ready to fully comply with International law and our International obligations to the global community.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
international_negotiations;International Pressure;Pression internationale;Internationaler Druck;;Presión internacional;;;;;;;;;x

desc_international_negotiations;We are exerting diplomatic pressure on a foreign country regarding a very specific issue.;Nous exerçons des pressions diplomatiques sur un pays étranger au sujet d'un problème bien spécifique.;Wir üben bezüglich eines sehr spezifischen Problems diplomatischen Druck auf ein ausländisches Land aus.;;Estamos ejerciendo presión diplomática sobre un país extranjero en relación con un tema muy concreto.;;;;;;;;;x
international_pariah;International Pariah;Paria International;Internationales Ausgestossen;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
international_pariah_desc;We are a pariah in the international community for our aggressive policies.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

introduce_the_presbyteries_desc;In 1848 The Kingdom of Hannover strengthened popular representation within its Lutheran State Church by the introduction of Presbyteries
column2: popularly elected church boards charged with administering church affairs.;En 1848
column3: le royaume de Hanovre renforça la représentation populaire au sein de l’Église Luthérienne d’État par l’introduction des presbytères
column4: des assemblées populaires élues chargées de l’administration des affaires de l’Église.;Im Jahr 1848 stärkte das Königreich Hannover die Repräsentation des Volkes in seiner lutheranischen Staatskirche durch die Einführung von Kirchenvorständen
column5: vom Volk gewählten Kirchenausschüssen
column6: die mit der Verwaltung von Kirchenangelegenheiten betraut wurden.;;En 1848
column7: el reino de Hannover reforzó la representación popular en el seno de su iglesia nacional mediante la creación de los presbiterios

column1: ionian_islands_question_title;Treaty of London (1864);Traité de Londres (1864);Das Londoner Protokoll (1864);;Tratado de Londres (1864);;;;;;;;;x;;

ionian_islands_question_desc;The Ionian Islands had been an amicable protectorate of the United Kingdom ever since the end of the Napoelonic Wars. In 1862 the protectorate was deemed too expensive to maintain
column2: and the islands were
column3: after two years of negotiations
column4: seceded to Greece.;Les Îles Ioniennes furent placées sous protectorat britannique et ce
column5: depuis la fin des guerres napoléoniennes. En 1862
column6: ce protectorat fut jugé trop onéreux à conserver et les îles furent
column7: au terme de deux ans de négociations
column8: rattachées à la Grèce.;Die ionischen Inseln waren seit dem Ende der napoleonischen Kriege ein Protektorat Großbritanniens gewesen. Im Jahr 1862 betrachtete man die Aufrechterhaltung dieses Protektorats als zu teuer
column9: und nach zweijährigen Verhandlungen wurden die Inseln an Griechenland abgetreten.;;Las islas Jónicas habían sido un protectorado amigo del Reino Unido desde el final de las Guerras Napoleónicas. En 1862 se decidió que el protectorado resultaba demasiado caro de mantener y las islas fueron
column10: tras dos años de negociación
column11: escindidas a Grecia.;;;;;;;;;x;;

column1: italia_irredenta_title;Italia Irredenta;Italia Irredenta;Italia Irredenta;;Italia Irredenta;;;;;;;;;x

italia_irredenta_desc;The Italian Irredentist movement strove for the transfer to the Kingdom of Italy of all territories in the immediate vicinity of the Kingdom which were largely or partly seen as populated by ethnic Italians. Not only did this include claims to Austrian lands in Italy proper
column2: but it also meant territorial ambitions further into Dalmatia
column3: and Austria.;Le mouvement irrédentiste voulait voir transférés à la couronne italienne tous les territoires limitrophes peuplés majoritairement ou en partie d'italiens. Cela concerne non seulement les possessions autrichiennes en Italie
column4: mais aussi des territoires en Dalmatie et en Autriche.;Die italienische Irredentistenbewegung strebte danach
column5: alle Gebiete in der unmittelbaren Umgebung des Königreichs Italien
column6: die tatsächlich oder vermeintlich größtenteils von Italienischstämmigen bewohnt wurden
column7: dem Königreich anzugliedern. Dies beinhaltete nicht nur Ansprüche auf österreichische Ländereien in italienischem Besitz
column8: sondern bedeutete auch territoriale Ansprüche weiter nach Dalmatien und Österreich hinein.;;El movimiento irredentista italiano aspiraba a obtener para Italia todos los territorios vecinos del joven reino que estaban
column9: mayoritaria o parcialmente poblados por personas de etnia italiana. Esto no solo incluía los territorios austriacos en Italia propiamente dicha
column10: sino también regiones diversas en Dalmacia y el interior de Austria.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: just_civilized;Just Civilized;;;;;;;;;;;;x
kaiser_wilhelms_land_title;Kaiser-Wilhelms-Land;Kaiser-Wilhelms-Land;Kaiser-Wilhelms-Land;;Tierra del Kaiser Guillermo;;;;;;;;;x
kaiser_wilhelms_land_desc;Named after the German Emperor
column2: 'Kaiser-Wilhelms-Land' was the German name for the North Eastern Part of the island of New Guinea
column3: which
column4: together with the Bismarck Archipelago and other pacific holdings constituted the German colony of Neuguinea. The territory was occupied by Australian troops during World War One
column5: and held as a League of Nations mandate until 1975.;Formé sur le nom de l’empereur d’Allemagne
column6: le « Kaiser-Wilhelms-Land » est le nom allemand de la partie nord-est de la Nouvelle Guinée
column7: qui constitue avec l’archipel Bismarck et d’autres possessions dans le Pacifique
column8: les colonies allemandes de Neuguinea. Ce territoire fut occupé par l’Australie au cours de la Première guerre mondiale
column9: et resta sous mandat de la Ligue des Nations jusqu’en 1975.;Kaiser-Wilhelms-Land' war der deutsche Name für den nach dem deutschen Kaiser benannten
column10: nordöstlichen Teil der Insel Neuguinea
column11: die
column12: zusammen mit dem Bismarck-Archipel und anderen Besitztümern im Pazifik die deutsche Kolonie Neuguinea bildete. Das Territorium wurde während des ersten Weltkriegs von australischen Truppen besetzt und stand bis 1975 unter dem Mandat der Vereinten Nationen.;;Llamada así por el emperador alemán
column13: 'Tierra del Kaiser Guillermo' fue el nombre que dieron los alemanes a la región nororiental de la isla de Nueva Guinea
column14: que
column15: junto con el archipiélago Bismarck y otras posesiones del Pacífico constituían la colonia alemana de Neuguinea. El territorio
column16: ocupado por tropas australianas durante la I Guerra Mundial
column17: quedó bajo la administración de la Liga de las Naciones hasta 1975.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: kalmar_union;Kalmar Union;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
kalmar_union_desc;We have agreed in principle to a closer bond with the other Scandinavian nations.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

kanagawa_treaty_desc;With enough pressure placed on the Japanese
column2: they will be forced to the negotiating table. A treaty can be hammered out at Kanagawa which will see Japan opened to outside trade and influence
column3: and our superiority proven beyond the shadow of a doubt.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: kansas_nebraska_act_title;Kansas-Nebraska Act;"Acte ""Kansas-Nebraska""";Kansas-Nebraska Act;;El Acta de Kansas-Nebraska;;;;;;;;;x;;;;
kansas_nebraska_act_desc;By enacting The Kansas-Nebraska act we will effectively repeal the Missouri Compromise of 1820
column2: and allow popular sovereignty to determine whether slavery should or should not be allowed in the former Colony of Louisiana
column3: and the territories presently created out of it. Abolitionists will resent us for it
column4: but it might be necessary to prevent the sundering of our Union.;En promulgant l'acte Kansas-Nebraska nous allons effectivement abroger le compromis du Missouri de 1820
column5: et permettre à la souveraineté populaire de déterminer si l'esclavage devrait ou ne devrait pas être autorisé dans l'ancienne colonie de la Louisiane
column6: et dans les territoires créés à partir de celui-ci. Les abolitionnistes nous en voudront pour cela
column7: mais c'est un mal nécessaire pour empêcher la fracture de l'Union.;Durch Verabschiedung des Kansas-Nebraska Act würden wir im Prinzip den Missouri Compromise von 1820 aufheben und die Volkssouveränität darüber entscheiden lassen
column8: ob die Sklaverei in der früheren Kolonie Louisiana und den daraus entstandenen Territorien erlaubt werden soll. Abolitionisten werden uns dafür hassen
column9: aber es mag notwenig sein
column10: um einen tiefen Riss in unserer Union zu verhindern.;;Al aprobar el Acta de Kansas-Nebraska
column11: a efectos prácticos estaremos anulando el Compromiso de Missouri de 1820
column12: lo que permitirá que sea la soberanía popular la que decida si se debe consentir la esclavitud en la antigua colonia de Louisiana y en los territorios creados a partir de ella. A los abolicionistas no les gustará
column13: pero podría ser necesario para impedir la fragmentación de nuestra Unión.;;;;;;;;;x;;;;

column1: kanun_i_esasi_title;Kanun-i-Esasi;Kanun-i-Esasi;Kanun-i-Esasi;;Kanun-i-Esasi;;;;;;;;;x
kanun_i_esasi_desc;Implemented in 1876
column2: the 'Kanun-i-Easasi' (Basic Law) was an early attempt at gifting the Ottoman Empire with a constitution. While the Basic Law would only remain in effect for two years before being repealed by Sultan Abdulhamid II
column3: it was nevertheless an important forerunner to the later development of Ottoman and Turkish constitutionalism.;Mise en place en 1876
column4: la « Kanun-i-Easasi » (la loi fondamentale) est une première tentative de doter l’Empire ottoman d’une constitution. Si la loi fondamentale ne resta en application que deux ans avant d’être repoussée par le sultan Abdulhamid II
column5: elle constitue cependant un signe précurseur important du futur développement du constitutionnalisme ottoman puis turc.;Das im Jahr 1876 verabschiedete 'Kanun-i-Esasi' (Grundgesetz) war ein früher Versuch
column6: das osmanische Reich mit einer Verfassung auszustatten. Obwohl das Grundgesetz nur zwei Jahre in Kraft war
column7: bevor es von Sultan Abdulhamid II. aufgehoben wurde
column8: war es dennoch ein wichtiger Vorläufer der späteren Entwicklung des osmanischen und türkischen Konstitutionalismus.;;Promulgada en 1876
column9: la 'Kanun-i-Easasi' (ley básica) representó el primer intento de dotar al Imperio Otomano de una constitución. Aunque solo permanecería vigente durante dos años
column10: hasta su derogación por parte del Sultán Abdulhamid II
column11: supuso un importante precedente en el posterior desarrollo del constitucionalismo otomano y turco.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: kettler_denkmal;Memorial to Foreign Diplomat;Monument dédié à un diplomate étranger;Gedenkstätte an ausländischen Diplomaten;;Monumento a un diplomático extranjero.;;;;;;;;;x;;;;

desc_kettler_denkmal;This memorial to a foreign diplomat stands as a permanent reminder to our people that our independence is being sold short by our government.;Ce monument dédié à un diplomate étranger rappelle au peuple que notre gouvernement a renoncé à notre indépendance.;Diese Gedenkstätte an einen ausländischen Diplomaten dient als permanente Erinnerung an unser Volk
column2: dass unsere Regierung mit unserer Unabhängigkeit Schindluder treibt.;;Este monumento a un diplomático extranjero es un recordatorio constante de para nuestra gente de que nuestro gobierno subestima nuestra independencia.;;;;;;;;;x;;;;

kiel_canal_dividend;Kiel Canal Dividend;;;;;;;;;;;;x
kiel_canal_dividend_desc;We are currently processing the receipts for ships having passed through the Kiel canal.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
king_cotton_title;King Cotton;Le coton-roi;King Cotton;;El rey algodón;;;;;;;;;x;;;;
king_cotton_desc;Without firing a gun
column2: without drawing a sword
column3: should they make war on us
column4: we could bring the whole world to our feet. What would happen if no cotton was furnished for three years? England would topple headlong and carry the whole civilized world with her to save the South.' -- James Henry Hammond\n\nBy enacting the King Cotton policy
column5: and boycotting all sales of cotton to the European powers
column6: we will give them a reason to intervene on our side in the present conflict between the states.;Sans tirer un coup de feu
column7: sans tirer une épée
column8: si on nous faisait la guerre
column9: nous pourrions mettre le monde entier à nos pieds.[...] Qu'est-ce qui se passerait si nous ne fournissions pas de coton pendant trois ans ?[...] L'Angleterre s'effondrerait la tête la première et entrainerait avec elle tout le monde civilisé
column10: à l'exception du Sud. Non
column11: vous n'oseriez pas faire la guerre au coton. Aucun pouvoir sur terre n'oserait le faire. Le coton est roi !' -- James Henry Hammond\n\nEn appliquant la politique du coton-roi
column12: et en boycottant les ventes de coton aux puissances européennes
column13: nous leur donnerons une bonne raison d'intervenir en notre faveur dans le conflit qui divise les Etats.;Ohne ein Gewehr abzufeuern

law_1420_of_general_common_education_desc;Law 1420 of General Common Education was an Argentine law passed in 1884
column2: during president Julio Argentino Roca
column3: that established the country's first free
column4: mandatory
column5: national and secular system of education. While the secular slant of the law caused some friction between the catholic church and the Argentine government
column6: the law can nevertheless be regarded a landmark in the history of Argentine education.;La loi 1420 d'enseignement public fut passée en Argentine en 1884
column7: sous la présidence de Julio Argentino Roca
column8: pour mettre en place le premier système éducatif gratuit
column9: obligatoire et séculaire du pays. Bien que la tendance séculaire de la loi suscita quelques tensions entre l'Église catholique et le gouvernement argentin
column10: cette loi marqua néanmoins un tournant important dans l'histoire de l'Argentine.;Das Gesetz 1420 für die Allgemeinbildung war ein im Jahr 1884 während der Amtszeit von Julio Argentino Roca verabschiedetes argentinisches Gesetz

column1: law_of_guarantees_title;The Law of Guarantees;La loi des garanties;Das Garantiegesetz;;La ley de garantías;;;;;;;;;x

law_of_guarantees_desc;In 1870 'The Law of Guarantees' was a law passed by the newly formed Kingdom of Italy -- aimed at solving the 'Roman Question' -- that accorded the pope privileges similar to that of the King himself
column2: including the right to send and receive ambassadors. Pope Pius IX refused to accept the laws
column3: which were seen by both him and his successors as an infringement of the independence of the Holy See. While the issue was not conclusively solved until the Lateran Treaty of 1929
column4: the Law of Guarantees nevertheless meant that the young Kingdom's capital would from then on be Rome.;En 1870
column5: la « Loi des garanties » fut passée par le tout jeune royaume d’Italie pour résoudre la « question romaine ». Cette loi accordait au pape des privilèges équivalents à ceux du roi
column6: y compris le droit de recevoir et de nommer des ambassadeurs. Le pape Pie IX refusa la loi
column7: que lui-même et ses successeurs considéraient comme une atteinte à l'indépendance du Saint Siège. Si la question ne fut définitivement réglée qu’en 1929 avec le Traité de Latran
column8: la loi des garanties a néanmoins établi que la capitale du nouveau royaume serait Rome.;Mit dem im Jahr 1870 vom neu gegründeten Königreich Italien verabschiedeten 'Garantiegesetz' sollte die 'Römische Frage' gelöst werden. Das Gesetz gestand dem Papst dieselben Privilegien wie dem König selbst zu
column9: einschließlich dem Recht
column10: Botschafter zu entsenden und zu empfangen. Papst Pius IX. lehnte das Gesetz ab
column11: das er und seine Nachfolger als Schmälerung der Unabhängigkeit des Heiligen Stuhls betrachteten. Obwohl das Problem erst in den Lateranverträgen von 1929 endgültig gelöst werden konnte
column12: bedeutete das Garantiegesetz trotzdem
column13: dass die Hauptstadt des jungen Königreichs von jenem Zeitpunkt an Rom war.;;En 1870
column14: con el fin de resolver la 'Cuestión Romana'
column15: el recién formado reino de Italia promulgó la 'ley de garantías'
column16: en la que se concedían al pontífice privilegios equivalentes a los del rey
column17: incluido el derecho a enviar y recibir embajadores. El papa Pío IX se negó a aceptar la ley
column18: a la que tanto él como sus sucesores consideraron un atentado contra la independencia de la Santa Sede. Aunque el asunto no quedaría permanentemente zanjado hasta el Tratado Laterano de 1929
column19: la ley de garantías suponía que la capital del joven reino estaría en la ciudad de Roma.;;;;;;;;;x
